'Authorization: Bearer <token>' \\\n  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n  --data '\n{\n  \"customMode\": true,\n  \"instrumental\": true,\n  \"model\": \"V4_5ALL\",\n  \"callBackUrl\": \"https://api.example.com/callback\",\n  \"prompt\": \"A calm and relaxing piano track with soft melodies\",\n  \"style\": \"Classical\",\n  \"title\": \"Peaceful Piano Meditation\",\n  \"personaId\": \"persona_123\",\n  \"negativeTags\": \"Heavy Metal, Upbeat Drums\",\n  \"vocalGender\": \"m\",\n  \"styleWeight\": 0.65,\n  \"weirdnessConstraint\": 0.65,\n  \"audioWeight\": 0.65\n}\n'\n```\n\n200\n\n```\n{\n  \"code\": 200,\n  \"msg\": \"success\",\n  \"data\": {\n    \"taskId\": \"5c79****be8e\"\n  }\n}\n```\n\nPOST\n\n/\n\napi\n\n/\n\nv1\n\n/\n\ngenerate\n\nTry it\n\nGenerate Music\n\ncURL\n\n```\ncurl --request POST \\\n  --url https://api.sunoapi.org/api/v1/generate \\\n  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <token>' \\\n  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n  --data '\n{\n  \"customMode\": true,\n  \"instrumental\": true,\n  \"model\": \"V4_5ALL\",\n  \"callBackUrl\": \"https://api.example.com/callback\",\n  \"prompt\": \"A calm and relaxing piano track with soft melodies\",\n  \"style\": \"Classical\",\n  \"title\": \"Peaceful Piano Meditation\",\n  \"personaId\": \"persona_123\",\n  \"negativeTags\": \"Heavy Metal, Upbeat Drums\",\n  \"vocalGender\": \"m\",\n  \"styleWeight\": 0.65,\n  \"weirdnessConstraint\": 0.65,\n  \"audioWeight\": 0.65\n}\n'\n```\n\n200\n\n```\n{\n  \"code\": 200,\n  \"msg\": \"success\",\n  \"data\": {\n    \"taskId\": \"5c79****be8e\"\n  }\n}\n```\n\nThis is the key endpoint in the Suno API. Each request returns exactly 2 songs.\n\n*   Stream URL: Available in 30-40 seconds.\n*   Downloadable song URL: Ready in 2-3 minutes.\n\nConcurrency limit: 20 requests every 10 seconds. Exceeding this will result in request rejection. Please review the parameters carefully to ensure proper use.\n\n### \n\n[â€‹\n\n](#parameter-usage-guide)\n\nParameter Usage Guide\n\n*   When customMode is true (Custom Mode):\n    *   If instrumental is true: style and title are required\n    *   If instrumental is false: style, prompt, and title are required\n    *   Prompt length limit:\n        *   For V4 model: 3000 characters\n        *   For V4\\_5, V4\\_5PLUS, V4\\_5ALL and V5 models: 5000 characters\n    *   Style length limit:\n        *   For V4 model: 200 characters\n        *   For V4\\_5, V4\\_5PLUS, V4\\_5ALL and V5 models: 1000 characters\n    *   Title length limit:\n        *   For V4 and V4\\_5ALL model: 80 characters\n        *   For V4\\_5, V4\\_5PLUS and V5 models: 100 characters\n*   When customMode is false (Non-custom Mode):\n    *   Only prompt is required regardless of instrumental setting\n    *   prompt length limit: 500 characters\n    *   Other parameters should be left empty\n\n### \n\n[â€‹\n\n](#developer-notes)\n\nDeveloper Notes\n\n1.  Recommendation for First-Time Users: Start with customMode: false and instrumental: false, and only provide a prompt. This is the simplest setup to quickly test the API and experience the results.\n2.  Generated files are retained for 15 days before being deleted\n3.  Ensure all required fields are provided based on the customMode and instrumental settings to avoid errors\n4.  Respect the character limits for prompt, style, and title to ensure successful processing\n5.  Callback process has three stages: text (text generation), first (first track complete), complete (all tracks complete)\n6.  You can use the Get Music Generation Details endpoint to actively check task status instead of waiting for callbacks\n\n#### Authorizations\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#authorization-authorization)\n\nAuthorization\n\nstring\n\nheader\n\nrequired\n\n# ðŸ”‘ API Authentication\n\nAll endpoints require authentication using Bearer Token.\n\n## Get API Key\n\n1.  Visit the [API Key Management Page](https://sunoapi.org/api-key) to obtain your API Key\n\n## Usage\n\nAdd to request headers:\n\n```\nAuthorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY\n```\n\n> âš ï¸ Note:\n> \n> *   Keep your API Key secure and do not share it with others\n> *   If you suspect your API Key has been compromised, reset it immediately from the management page\n\n#### Body\n\napplication/json\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-custom-mode)\n\ncustomMode\n\nboolean\n\nrequired\n\nEnables Custom Mode for advanced audio generation settings.\n\n*   Set to `true` to use Custom Mode (requires `style` and `title`; `prompt` required if `instrumental` is `false`). The prompt will be strictly used as lyrics if `instrumental` is `false`.\n*   Set to `false` for Non-custom Mode (only `prompt` is required). Lyrics will be auto-generated based on the prompt.\n\nExample:\n\n`true`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-instrumental)\n\ninstrumental\n\nboolean\n\nrequired\n\nDetermines if the audio should be instrumental (no lyrics).\n\n*   In Custom Mode (`customMode: true`):\n    *   If `true`: Only `style` and `title` are required.\n    *   If `false`: `style`, `title`, and `prompt` are required (with `prompt` used as the exact lyrics).\n*   In Non-custom Mode (`customMode: false`): No impact on required fields (`prompt` only). Lyrics are auto-generated if `instrumental` is `false`.\n\nExample:\n\n`true`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-model)\n\nmodel\n\nenum<string>\n\nrequired\n\nThe model version to use for audio generation.\n\n*   Available options:\n    *   `V5`: Superior musical expression, faster generation.\n    *   `V4_5PLUS`: V4.5+ is richer sound, new ways to create, max 8 min.\n    *   `V4_5ALL`: V4.5-all is better song structure, max 8 min.\n    *   `V4_5`: Superior genre blending with smarter prompts and faster output, up to 8 minutes.\n    *   `V4`: Best audio quality with refined song structure, up to 4 minutes.\n\nAvailable options:\n\n`V4`,\n\n`V4_5`,\n\n`V4_5PLUS`,\n\n`V4_5ALL`,\n\n`V5`\n\nExample:\n\n`\"V4_5ALL\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-call-back-url)\n\ncallBackUrl\n\nstring<uri>\n\nrequired\n\nThe URL to receive task completion notifications when music generation is complete.\n\nFor detailed callback format and implementation guide, see [Music Generation Callbacks](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/generate-music-callbacks)\n\n*   Alternatively, you can use the get music generation details endpoint to poll task status\n\nExample:\n\n`\"https://api.example.com/callback\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-prompt)\n\nprompt\n\nstring\n\nA description of the desired audio content.\n\n*   In Custom Mode (`customMode: true`): Required if `instrumental` is `false`. The prompt will be strictly used as the lyrics and sung in the generated track. Character limits by model:\n    *   V4: Maximum 3000 characters\n    *   V4\\_5, V4\\_5PLUS, V4\\_5ALL & V5: Maximum 5000 characters  \n        Example: \"A calm and relaxing piano track with soft melodies\"\n*   In Non-custom Mode (`customMode: false`): Always required. The prompt serves as the core idea, and lyrics will be automatically generated based on it (not strictly matching the input). Maximum 500 characters.  \n    Example: \"A short relaxing piano tune\"\n\nExample:\n\n`\"A calm and relaxing piano track with soft melodies\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-style)\n\nstyle\n\nstring\n\nThe music style or genre for the audio.\n\n*   Required in Custom Mode (`customMode: true`). Examples: \"Jazz\", \"Classical\", \"Electronic\".\n    *   For V4 model: Max length: 200 characters.\n    *   For V4\\_5, V4\\_5PLUS, V4\\_5ALL and V5 models: Max length: 1000 characters.  \n        Example: \"Classical\"\n*   In Non-custom Mode (`customMode: false`): Leave empty.\n\nExample:\n\n`\"Classical\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-title)\n\ntitle\n\nstring\n\nThe title of the generated music track.\n\n*   Required in Custom Mode (`customMode: true`). Character limits by model:\n    *   V4 & V4\\_5ALL: Maximum 80 characters\n    *   V4\\_5, V4\\_5PLUS & V5: Maximum 100 characters  \n        Example: \"Peaceful Piano Meditation\"\n*   In Non-custom Mode (`customMode: false`): Leave empty.\n\nExample:\n\n`\"Peaceful Piano Meditation\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-persona-id)\n\npersonaId\n\nstring\n\nOnly available when Custom Mode (`customMode: true`) is enabled. Persona ID to apply to the generated music. Optional. Use this to apply a specific persona style to your music generation.\n\nTo generate a persona ID, use the [Generate Persona](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/generate-persona) endpoint to create a personalized music Persona based on generated music.\n\nExample:\n\n`\"persona_123\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-negative-tags)\n\nnegativeTags\n\nstring\n\nMusic styles or traits to exclude from the generated audio.\n\n*   Optional. Use to avoid specific styles.  \n    Example: \"Heavy Metal, Upbeat Drums\"\n\nExample:\n\n`\"Heavy Metal, Upbeat Drums\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-vocal-gender)\n\nvocalGender\n\nenum<string>\n\nPreferred vocal gender for generated vocals. Optional.\n\nAvailable options:\n\n`m`,\n\n`f`\n\nExample:\n\n`\"m\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-style-weight)\n\nstyleWeight\n\nnumber\n\nWeight of the provided style guidance. Range 0.00â€“1.00.\n\nRequired range: `0 <= x <= 1`Must be a multiple of `0.01`\n\nExample:\n\n`0.65`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-weirdness-constraint)\n\nweirdnessConstraint\n\nnumber\n\nConstraint on creative deviation/novelty. Range 0.00â€“1.00.\n\nRequired range: `0 <= x <= 1`Must be a multiple of `0.01`\n\nExample:\n\n`0.65`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-audio-weight)\n\naudioWeight\n\nnumber\n\nWeight of the input audio influence (where applicable). Range 0.00â€“1.00.\n\nRequired range: `0 <= x <= 1`Must be a multiple of `0.01`\n\nExample:\n\n`0.65`\n\n#### Response\n\n200\n\napplication/json\n\nRequest successful\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-code)\n\ncode\n\nenum<integer>\n\n# Status Codes\n\n*   âœ… 200 - Request successful\n*   âš ï¸ 400 - Invalid parameters\n*   âš ï¸ 401 - Unauthorized access\n*   âš ï¸ 404 - Invalid request method or path\n*   âš ï¸ 405 - Rate limit exceeded\n*   âš ï¸ 413 - Theme or prompt too long\n*   âš ï¸ 429 - Insufficient credits\n*   âš ï¸ 430 - Your call frequency is too high. Please try again later.\n*   âš ï¸ 455 - System maintenance\n*   âŒ 500 - Server error\n\nAvailable options:\n\n`200`,\n\n`400`,\n\n`401`,\n\n`404`,\n\n`405`,\n\n`413`,\n\n`429`,\n\n`430`,\n\n`455`,\n\n`500`\n\nExample:\n\n`200`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-msg)\n\nmsg\n\nstring\n\nError message when code != 200\n\nExample:\n\n`\"success\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-data)\n\ndata\n\nobject\n\nShow child attributes\n\n[Suno API Quick Start](/suno-api/quickstart)[Music Generation Callbacks](/suno-api/generate-music-callbacks)\n\n---\n\n## Source: https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/generate-persona\n\n# Generate Persona - Suno API\n\nGenerate Persona\n\n### Usage Guide\n\n*   Use this endpoint to create Personas (music characters) for generated music\n*   Requires the taskId from music generation related endpoints (generate, extend, cover, upload-extend) and audio ID\n*   Customize the Persona name and description to give music unique personality\n*   Generated Personas can be used for subsequent music creation and style transfer\n\n### Parameter Details\n\n*   `taskId`: Required parameter, can be obtained from the following endpoints:\n    *   [Generate Music](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/generate-music) (`/api/v1/generate`)\n    *   [Extend Music](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/extend-music) (`/api/v1/generate/extend`)\n    *   [Upload And Cover Audio](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/upload-and-cover-audio) (`/api/v1/generate/upload-cover`)\n    *   [Upload And Extend Audio](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/upload-and-extend-audio) (`/api/v1/generate/upload-extend`)\n*   `audioId`: Required parameter, specifies the audio ID to create Persona for\n*   `name`: Required parameter, assigns an easily recognizable name to the Persona\n*   `description`: Required parameter, describes the Personaâ€™s musical characteristics, style, and personality\n\n### Developer Notes\n\n*   **Important**: Ensure the music generation task is fully completed before calling this endpoint. If the music is still generating, this endpoint will return a failure\n*   **Model Requirement**: Persona generation supports taskId from music generated with models V4 and above\n*   It is recommended to provide detailed descriptions for Personas to better capture musical characteristics\n*   The returned `personaId` can be used in subsequent music generation requests to create music with similar style characteristics\n*   You can apply the `personaId` to the following endpoints:\n    *   [Generate Music](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/generate-music)\n    *   [Extend Music](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/extend-music)\n    *   [Upload And Cover Audio](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/upload-and-cover-audio)\n    *   [Upload And Extend Audio](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/upload-and-extend-audio)\n*   Each audio ID can only generate a Persona once\n\n### Parameter Example\n\n```\n{\n  \"taskId\": \"5c79****be8e\",\n  \"audioId\": \"e231****-****-****-****-****8cadc7dc\",\n  \"name\": \"Electronic Pop Singer\",\n  \"description\": \"A modern electronic music style pop singer, skilled in dynamic rhythms and synthesizer tones\"\n}\n```\n\n## ðŸ”‘ API Authentication\n\nAll endpoints require authentication using Bearer Token.\n\n## Get API Key\n\n1.  Visit the [API Key Management Page](https://sunoapi.org/api-key) to obtain your API Key\n\n## Usage\n\nAdd to request headers:\n\n```\nAuthorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY\n```\n\n> âš ï¸ Note:\n> \n> *   Keep your API Key secure and do not share it with others\n> *   If you suspect your API Key has been compromised, reset it immediately from the management page\n\n#### Body\n\napplication/json\n\ntaskId\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nUnique identifier of the original music generation task. This can be a taskId returned from any of the following endpoints:\n\n*   Generate Music (/api/v1/generate)\n*   Extend Music (/api/v1/generate/extend)\n*   Upload And Cover Audio (/api/v1/generate/upload-cover)\n*   Upload And Extend Audio (/api/v1/generate/upload-extend)\n\nExample:\n\n`\"5c79****be8e\"`\n\naudioId\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nAudio ID of the music track to create Persona for.\n\nExample:\n\n`\"e231****-****-****-****-****8cadc7dc\"`\n\nname\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nName for the Persona. A descriptive name that captures the essence of the musical style or character.\n\nExample:\n\n`\"Electronic Pop Singer\"`\n\ndescription\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nDetailed description of the Persona's musical characteristics, style, and personality. Be specific about genre, mood, instrumentation, and vocal qualities.\n\nExample:\n\n`\"A modern electronic music style pop singer, skilled in dynamic rhythms and synthesizer tones\"`\n\nRequest successful\n\ncode\n\nenum<integer>\n\nResponse Status Codes\n\n*   200: Success - Request has been processed successfully\n*   401: Unauthorized - Authentication credentials are missing or invalid\n*   402: Insufficient Credits - Account does not have enough credits to perform the operation\n*   404: Not Found - The requested resource or endpoint does not exist\n*   409: Conflict - Persona already exists for this music\n*   422: Validation Error - The request parameters failed validation checks\n*   429: Rate Limited - Request limit has been exceeded for this resource\n*   451: Unauthorized - Failed to fetch the music data. Kindly verify any access limits set by you or your service provider\n*   455: Service Unavailable - System is currently undergoing maintenance\n*   500: Server Error - An unexpected error occurred while processing the request\n\nAvailable options\n\n:\n\n`200`,\n\n`401`,\n\n`402`,\n\n`404`,\n\n`409`,\n\n`422`,\n\n`429`,\n\n`451`,\n\n`455`,\n\n`500`\n\nmsg\n\nstring\n\nError message when code != 200\n\nExample:\n\n`\"success\"`\n\ndata\n\nobject\n\nShow child attributes\n\n---\n\n## Source: https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/get-cover-suno-details\n\n# Get Music Cover Details - Suno \\\n  --url https://api.sunoapi.org/api/v1/suno/cover/record-info \\\n  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <token>'\n```\n\n200\n\n```\n{\n  \"code\": 200,\n  \"msg\": \"success\",\n  \"data\": {\n    \"taskId\": \"21aee3c3c2a01fa5e030b3799fa4dd56\",\n    \"parentTaskId\": \"73d6128b3523a0079df10da9471017c8\",\n    \"callbackUrl\": \"https://api.example.com/callback\",\n    \"completeTime\": \"2025-01-15T10:35:27.000Z\",\n    \"response\": {\n      \"images\": [\n        \"https://tempfile.aiquickdraw.com/s/1753958521_6c1b3015141849d1a9bf17b738ce9347.png\",\n 200,\n    \"errorMessage\": \"\"\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### \n\n[â€‹\n\n](#usage-guide)\n\nUsage Guide\n\n*   Use this interface to check Cover generation task status\n*   Access generated cover image URLs upon completion\n*   Track processing progress and any errors that may occur\n*   Supports polling to get task results, recommend querying every 30 seconds\n\n### \n\n[â€‹\n\n](#developer-notes)\n\nDeveloper Notes\n\n*   Cover image URLs are only available upon successful completion\n*   Error codes and messages are provided for failed tasks\n*   After successful processing, cover images are retained for 14 days\n*   Usually generates 2 different style cover images\n\n#### Authorizations\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#authorization-authorization)\n\nAuthorization\n\nstring\n\nheader\n\nrequired\n\n# ðŸ”‘ API Authentication\n\nAll endpoints require authentication using Bearer Token.\n\n## Get API Key\n\n1.  Visit the [API Key Management Page](https://sunoapi.org/api-key) to obtain your API Key\n\n## Usage\n\nAdd to request headers:\n\n```\nAuthorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY\n```\n\n> âš ï¸ Note:\n> \n> *   Keep your API Key secure and do not share it with others\n> *   If you suspect your API Key has been compromised, reset it immediately from the management page\n\n#### Query Parameters\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#parameter-task-id)\n\ntaskId\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nUnique identifier of the Cover generation task to retrieve. This is the taskId returned when creating the Cover generation task.\n\n#### Response\n\n200\n\napplication/json\n\nSuccess\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-code)\n\ncode\n\nenum<integer>\n\nStatus code\n\nAvailable options:\n\n`200`,\n\n`400`,\n\n`401`,\n\n`402`,\n\n`404`,\n\n`409`,\n\n`422`,\n\n`429`,\n\n`455`,\n\n`500`\n\nExample:\n\n`200`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-msg)\n\nmsg\n\nstring\n\nStatus message\n\nExample:\n\n`\"success\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-data)\n\ndata\n\nobject\n\nShow child attributes\n\n[Replace Music Section Callbacks](/suno-api/replace-section-callbacks)[Generate Persona](/suno-api/generate-persona)\n\n---\n\n## Source: https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/generate-music-callbacks\n\n# Music Generation Callbacks - Suno API\n\nWhen you submit a task to the Music Generation API, you can use the `callBackUrl` parameter to set a callback URL. When the task is completed, the system will automatically push the results to your specified address.\n\n## Callback Mechanism Overview\n\n### Callback Timing\n\nThe system will send callback notifications in the following situations:\n\n*   Music generation task completed successfully\n*   Music generation task failed\n*   Errors occurred during task processing\n\n### Callback Method\n\n*   **HTTP Method**: POST\n*   **Content Type**: application/json\n*   **Timeout Setting**: 15 seconds\n\n## Callback Request Format\n\nWhen the task is completed, the system will send a POST request to your `callBackUrl` in the following format:\n\n## Status Code Description\n\ncode\n\ninteger\n\nrequired\n\nCallback status code indicating task processing result:\n\nStatus Code\n\nDescription\n\n200\n\nSuccess - Music generation completed\n\n400\n\nBad Request - Parameter error, content violation, etc.\n\n451\n\nDownload Failed - Unable to download related files\n\n500\n\nServer Error - Please try again later\n\nmsg\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nStatus message providing detailed status description\n\ndata.callbackType\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nCallback type indicating the current callback stage:\n\n*   `text`: Text generation completed\n*   `first`: First music track completed\n*   `complete`: All music tracks completed\n*   `error`: Task failed\n\ndata.task\\_id\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nTask ID, consistent with the taskId returned when you submitted the task\n\ndata.data\n\narray\n\nMusic generation result information, returned on success\n\ndata.data\\[\\].id\n\nstring\n\nMusic unique identifier\n\ndata.data\\[\\].audio\\_url\n\nstring\n\nGenerated audio file URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].source\\_audio\\_url\n\nstring\n\nOriginal audio file URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].stream\\_audio\\_url\n\nstring\n\nStreaming audio URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].source\\_stream\\_audio\\_url\n\nstring\n\nOriginal streaming audio URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].image\\_url\n\nstring\n\nCover image URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].source\\_image\\_url\n\nstring\n\nOriginal cover image URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].prompt\n\nstring\n\nGeneration prompt/lyrics\n\ndata.data\\[\\].model\\_name\n\nstring\n\nModel name used\n\ndata.data\\[\\].title\n\nstring\n\nMusic title\n\ndata.data\\[\\].tags\n\nstring\n\nMusic tags\n\ndata.data\\[\\].createTime\n\nstring\n\nCreation time\n\ndata.data\\[\\].duration\n\nnumber\n\nAudio duration (seconds)\n\n## Callback Reception Examples\n\nHere are example codes for receiving callbacks in popular programming languages:\n\n*   Node.js\n    \n*   Python\n    \n*   PHP\n    \n\n```\nconst express = require('express');\nconst app = express();\n\napp.use(express.json());\n\napp.post('/generate-music-callback', (req, res) => {\n  const { code, msg, data } = req.body;\n  \n  console.log('Received music generation callback:', {\n    taskId: data.task_id,\n    callbackType: data.callbackType,\n    status: code,\n    message: msg\n  });\n  \n  if (code === 200) {\n    // Task completed successfully\n    console.log('Music generation completed');\n    const musicData = data.data || [];\n    \n    console.log(`Generated ${musicData.length} music tracks:`);\n    musicData.forEach((music, index) => {\n      console.log(`Music ${index + 1}:`);\n      console.log(`  Title: ${music.title}`);\n      console.log(`  Duration: ${music.duration} seconds`);\n      console.log(`  Tags: ${music.tags}`);\n      console.log(`  Audio URL: ${music.audio_url}`);\n      console.log(`  Cover URL: ${music.image_url}`);\n    });\n    \n    // Process generated music\n    // Can download audio files, save locally, etc.\n    \n  } else {\n    // Task failed\n    console.log('Music generation failed:', msg);\n    \n    // Handle failure cases...\n    if (code === 400) {\n      console.log('Parameter error or content violation');\n    } else if (code === 451) {\n      console.log('File download failed');\n    } else if (code === 500) {\n      console.log('Server internal error');\n    }\n  }\n  \n  // Return 200 status code to confirm callback received\n  res.status(200).json({ status: 'received' });\n});\n\napp.listen(3000, () => {\n  console.log('Callback server running on port 3000');\n});\n```\n\n```\nfrom flask import Flask, request, jsonify\nimport requests\n\napp = Flask(__name__)\n\n@app.route('/generate-music-callback', methods=['POST'])\ndef handle_callback():\n    data = request.json\n    \n    code = data.get('code')\n    msg = data.get('msg')\n    callback_data = data.get('data', {})\n    task_id = callback_data.get('task_id')\n    callback_type = callback_data.get('callbackType')\n    music_data = callback_data.get('data', [])\n    \n    print(f\"Received music generation callback: {task_id}, type: {callback_type}, status: {code}, message: {msg}\")\n    \n    if code == 200:\n        # Task completed successfully\n        print(\"Music generation completed\")\n        \n        print(f\"Generated {len(music_data)} music tracks:\")\n        for i, music in enumerate(music_data):\n            print(f\"Music {i + 1}:\")\n            print(f\"  Title: {music.get('title')}\")\n            print(f\"  Duration: {music.get('duration')} seconds\")\n            print(f\"  Tags: {music.get('tags')}\")\n            print(f\"  Audio URL: {music.get('audio_url')}\")\n            print(f\"  Cover URL: {music.get('image_url')}\")\n            \n            # Download audio file example\n            try:\n                audio_url = music.get('audio_url')\n                if audio_url:\n                    response = requests.get(audio_url)\n                    if response.status_code == 200:\n                        filename = f\"generated_music_{task_id}_{i + 1}.mp3\"\n                        with open(filename, \"wb\") as f:\n                            f.write(response.content)\n                        print(f\"Audio saved as {filename}\")\n            except Exception as e:\n                print(f\"Audio download failed: {e}\")\n                \n    else:\n        # Task failed\n        print(f\"Music generation failed: {msg}\")\n        \n        # Handle failure cases...\n        if code == 400:\n            print(\"Parameter error or content violation\")\n        elif code == 451:\n            print(\"File download failed\")\n        elif code == 500:\n            print(\"Server internal error\")\n    \n    # Return 200 status code to confirm callback received\n    return jsonify({'status': 'received'}), 200\n\nif __name__ == '__main__':\n    app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=3000)\n```\n\n```\n<?php\nheader('Content-Type: application/json');\n\n// Get POST data\n$input = file_get_contents('php://input');\n$data = json_decode($input, true);\n\n$code = $data['code'] ?? null;\n$msg = $data['msg'] ?? '';\n$callbackData = $data['data'] ?? [];\n$taskId = $callbackData['task_id'] ?? '';\n$callbackType = $callbackData['callbackType'] ?? '';\n$musicData = $callbackData['data'] ?? [];\n\nerror_log(\"Received music generation callback: $taskId, type: $callbackType, status: $code, message: $msg\");\n\nif ($code === 200) {\n    // Task completed successfully\n    error_log(\"Music generation completed\");\n    \n    error_log(\"Generated \" . count($musicData) . \" music tracks:\");\n    foreach ($musicData as $index => $music) {\n        error_log(\"Music \" . ($index + 1) . \":\");\n        error_log(\"  Title: \" . ($music['title'] ?? ''));\n        error_log(\"  Duration: \" . ($music['duration'] ?? 0) . \" seconds\");\n        error_log(\"  Tags: \" . ($music['tags'] ?? ''));\n        error_log(\"  Audio URL: \" . ($music['audio_url'] ?? ''));\n        error_log(\"  Cover URL: \" . ($music['image_url'] ?? ''));\n        \n        // Download audio file example\n        try {\n            $audioUrl = $music['audio_url'] ?? '';\n            if ($audioUrl) {\n                $audioContent = file_get_contents($audioUrl);\n                if ($audioContent !== false) {\n                    $filename = \"generated_music_{$taskId}_\" . ($index + 1) . \".mp3\";\n                    file_put_contents($filename, $audioContent);\n                    error_log(\"Audio saved as $filename\");\n                }\n            }\n        } catch (Exception $e) {\n            error_log(\"Audio download failed: \" . $e->getMessage());\n        }\n    }\n    \n} else {\n    // Task failed\n    error_log(\"Music generation failed: $msg\");\n    \n    // Handle failure cases...\n    if ($code === 400) {\n        error_log(\"Parameter error or content violation\");\n    } elseif ($code === 451) {\n        error_log(\"File download failed\");\n    } elseif ($code === 500) {\n        error_log(\"Server internal error\");\n    }\n}\n\n// Return 200 status code to confirm callback received\nhttp_response_code(200);\necho json_encode(['status' => 'received']);\n?>\n```\n\n## Best Practices\n\n## Troubleshooting\n\nIf you do not receive callback notifications, please check the following:\n\n## Alternative Solution\n\nIf you cannot use the callback mechanism, you can also use polling:\n\n[\n\n## Poll Query Results\n\nUse the get music generation details endpoint to regularly query task status. We recommend querying every 30 seconds.\n\n\n\n](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/get-music-generation-details)\n\n---\n\n## Source: song about peaceful night in the city\\\"}\",\n    \"response\": {\n      \"taskId\": \"11dc****8b0f\",\n      \"data\": [\n        {\n          \"text\": \"[Verse]\\næˆ‘ç©¿è¶ŠåŸŽå¸‚é»‘æš—å¤œ\\nå¿ƒä¸­ç‡ƒçƒ§æ¢¦æƒ³çš„çƒˆç«\",\n          \"title\": \"é’¢é“ä¾ \",\n          \"status\": \"complete\",\n          \"errorMessage\": \"\"\n        }\n      ]\n    },\n    \"status\": \"SUCCESS\",\n    \"type\": \"LYRICS\",\n    \"errorCode\": null,\n    \"errorMessage\": null\n  }\n}\n```\n\nGET\n\n/\n\napi\n\n/\n\nv1\n\n/\n\nlyrics\n\n/\n\nrecord-info\n\nTry it\n\nGet Lyrics Generation Details\n\ncURL\n\n```\ncurl --request GET \\\n  --url https://api.sunoapi.org/api/v1/lyrics/record-info \\\n  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <token>'\n```\n\n200\n\n```\n{\n  \"code\": 200,\n  \"msg\": \"success\",\n  \"data\": {\n    \"taskId\": \"11dc****8b0f\",\n    \"param\": \"{\\\"prompt\\\":\\\"A song about peaceful night in the city\\\"}\",\n    \"response\": {\n      \"taskId\": \"11dc****8b0f\",\n      \"data\": [\n        {\n          \"text\": \"[Verse]\\næˆ‘ç©¿è¶ŠåŸŽå¸‚é»‘æš—å¤œ\\nå¿ƒä¸­ç‡ƒçƒ§æ¢¦æƒ³çš„çƒˆç«\",\n          \"title\": \"é’¢é“ä¾ \",\n          \"status\": \"complete\",\n          \"errorMessage\": \"\"\n        }\n      ]\n    },\n    \"status\": \"SUCCESS\",\n    \"type\": \"LYRICS\",\n    \"errorCode\": null,\n    \"errorMessage\": null\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### \n\n[â€‹\n\n](#status-descriptions)\n\nStatus Descriptions\n\n*   PENDING: Task is waiting to be processed\n*   SUCCESS: Lyrics generated successfully\n*   CREATE\\_TASK\\_FAILED: Failed to create the task\n*   GENERATE\\_LYRICS\\_FAILED: Failed to generate lyrics\n*   CALLBACK\\_EXCEPTION: Error occurred during callback\n*   SENSITIVE\\_WORD\\_ERROR: Content contains prohibited words\n\n### \n\n[â€‹\n\n](#developer-notes)\n\nDeveloper Notes\n\n*   Use this endpoint to check task status instead of waiting for callbacks\n*   This returns all generated lyrics variations from a single task\n*   Each lyrics variation includes a title and complete lyrics text\n\n#### Authorizations\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#authorization-authorization)\n\nAuthorization\n\nstring\n\nheader\n\nrequired\n\n# ðŸ”‘ API Authentication\n\nAll endpoints require authentication using Bearer Token.\n\n## Get API Key\n\n1.  Visit the [API Key Management Page](https://sunoapi.org/api-key) to obtain your API Key\n\n## Usage\n\nAdd to request headers:\n\n```\nAuthorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY\n```\n\n> âš ï¸ Note:\n> \n> *   Keep your API Key secure and do not share it with others\n> *   If you suspect your API Key has been compromised, reset it immediately from the management page\n\n#### Query Parameters\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#parameter-task-id)\n\ntaskId\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nThe task ID returned from the Generate Lyrics endpoint. Used to retrieve detailed information about a specific lyrics generation task.\n\n#### Response\n\n200\n\napplication/json\n\nRequest successful\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-code)\n\ncode\n\nenum<integer>\n\n# Status Codes\n\n*   âœ… 200 - Request successful\n*   âš ï¸ 400 - Invalid parameters\n*   âš ï¸ 401 - Unauthorized access\n*   âš ï¸ 404 - Invalid request method or path\n*   âš ï¸ 405 - Rate limit exceeded\n*   âš ï¸ 413 - Theme or prompt too long\n*   âš ï¸ 429 - Insufficient credits\n*   âš ï¸ 430 - Your call frequency is too high. Please try again later.\n*   âš ï¸ 455 - System maintenance\n*   âŒ 500 - Server error\n\nAvailable options:\n\n`200`,\n\n`400`,\n\n`401`,\n\n`404`,\n\n`405`,\n\n`413`,\n\n`429`,\n\n`430`,\n\n`455`,\n\n`500`\n\nExample:\n\n`200`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-msg)\n\nmsg\n\nstring\n\nError message when code != 200\n\nExample:\n\n`\"success\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-data)\n\ndata\n\nobject\n\nShow child attributes\n\n[Lyrics Generation Callbacks](/suno-api/generate-lyrics-callbacks)[Convert to WAV Format](/suno-api/convert-to-wav-format)\n\n---\n\n## Source: https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/get-music-video-details\n\n# Get Music Video Details - Suno API\n\n[![light   ](/suno-api/generate-lyrics-callbacks)\n*   [GET\n    \n    Get Lyrics Generation Details\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/get-lyrics-generation-details)\n\n*   [POST\n    \n    Convert to WAV    Get WAV Conversion Details\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/get-wav-conversion-details)\n\n*   [POST\n    \n    Vocalâ€¯&â€¯Instrument Stem Separation\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/separate-vocals-from-music)\n*   [\n    \n    Audio Separation Callbacks\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/separate-vocals-from-music-callbacks)\n*   [GET\n    \n    Get Audio Separation Details\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/get-vocal-separation-details)\n\n*   [POST\n    \n    Create Music Video\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/create-music-video)\n*   [\n    \n    Music Video Generation Callbacks\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/create-music-video-callbacks)\n*   [GET\n    \n    Get Music Video Details\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/get-music-video-details)\n\n*   [GET\n    \n    Get Remaining Credits\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/get-remaining-credits)\n\nGet Music Video Details\n\ncURL\n\n```\ncurl --request GET \\\n  --url https://api.sunoapi.org/api/v1/mp4/record-info \\\n  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <token>'\n```\n\n200\n\n```\n{\n  \"code\": 200,\n  \"msg\": \"success\",\n  \"data\": {\n    \"taskId\": \"988e****c8d3\",\n    \"musicId\": \"376c687e-d439-42c1-b1e4-bcb43b095ec2\",\n    \"musicIndex\": 0,\n    \"callbackUrl\": \"https://api.example.com/callback\",\n    \"completeTime\": \"2025-01-01 00:10:00\",\n    \"response\": {\n      \"videoUrl\": \"https://example.com/videos/video_847715e66259.mp4\"\n    },\n    \"successFlag\": \"SUCCESS\",\n    \"createTime\": \"2025-01-01 00:00:00\",\n    \"errorCode\": null,\n    \"errorMessage\": null\n  }\n}\n```\n\nGET\n\n/\n\napi\n\n/\n\nv1\n\n/\n\nmp4\n\n/\n\nrecord-info\n\nTry it\n\nGet Music Video Details\n\ncURL\n\n```\ncurl --request GET \\\n  --url https://api.sunoapi.org/api/v1/mp4/record-info \\\n  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <token>'\n```\n\n200\n\n```\n{\n  \"code\": 200,\n  \"msg\": \"success\",\n  \"data\": {\n \"2025-01-01 00:10:00\",\n    \"response\": {\n      \"videoUrl\": \"https://example.com/videos/video_847715e66259.mp4\"\n    },\n    \"successFlag\": \"SUCCESS\",\n    \"createTime\": \"2025-01-01 00:00:00\",\n    \"errorCode\": null,\n    \"errorMessage\": null\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### \n\n[â€‹\n\n](#status-descriptions)\n\nStatus Descriptions\n\n*   PENDING: Task is waiting to be processed\n*   SUCCESS: Video generation completed successfully\n*   CREATE\\_TASK\\_FAILED: Failed to create the video task\n*   GENERATE\\_MP4\\_FAILED: MP4 generation failed\n*   CALLBACK\\_EXCEPTION: Callback exception\n\n#### Authorizations\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#authorization-authorization)\n\nAuthorization\n\nstring\n\nheader\n\nrequired\n\n# ðŸ”‘ API Authentication\n\nAll endpoints require authentication using Bearer Token.\n\n## Get API Key\n\n1.  Visit the [API Key Management Page](https://sunoapi.org/api-key) to obtain your API Key\n\n## Usage\n\nAdd to request headers:\n\n```\nAuthorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY\n```\n\n> âš ï¸ Note:\n> \n> *   Keep your API Key secure and do not share it with others\n> *   If you suspect your API Key has been compromised, reset it immediately from the management page\n\n#### Query Parameters\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#parameter-task-id)\n\ntaskId\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nThe task ID returned from the Create Music Video endpoint. Used to retrieve detailed information about the video generation task, including processing status and download URL.\n\n#### Response\n\n200\n\napplication/json\n\nRequest successful\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-code)\n\ncode\n\nenum<integer>\n\n# Status Codes\n\n*   âœ… 200 - Request successful\n*   âš ï¸ 400 - Invalid parameters\n*   âš ï¸ 401 - Unauthorized access\n*   âš ï¸ 404 - Invalid request method or path\n*   âš ï¸ 405 - Rate limit exceeded\n*   âš ï¸ 413 - Theme or prompt too long\n*   âš ï¸ 429 - Insufficient credits\n*   âš ï¸ 430 - Your call frequency is too high. Please try again later.\n*   âš ï¸ 455 - System maintenance\n*   âŒ 500 - Server error\n\nAvailable options:\n\n`200`,\n\n`400`,\n\n`401`,\n\n`404`,\n\n`405`,\n\n`413`,\n\n`429`,\n\n`430`,\n\n`455`,\n\n`500`\n\nExample:\n\n`200`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-msg)\n\nmsg\n\nstring\n\nError message when code != 200\n\nExample:\n\n`\"success\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-data)\n\ndata\n\nobject\n\nShow child attributes\n\n[Music Video Generation Callbacks](/suno-api/create-music-video-callbacks)[Get Remaining Lyrics/text generation completed successfully\n*   FIRST\\_SUCCESS: First track generation completed successfully\n*   SUCCESS: All tracks generated successfully\n*   CREATE\\_TASK\\_FAILED: Failed to create the generation task\n*   GENERATE\\_AUDIO\\_FAILED: Failed to generate music tracks\n*   CALLBACK\\_EXCEPTION: Error occurred during callback\n*   SENSITIVE\\_WORD\\_ERROR: Content contains prohibited words\n\n### \n\n[â€‹\n\n](#developer-notes)\n\nDeveloper Notes\n\n*   For instrumental tracks (instrumental=true), no lyrics data will be included in the response\n*   Use this endpoint to check task status instead of waiting for callbacks\n\n#### Authorizations\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#authorization-authorization)\n\nAuthorization\n\nstring\n\nheader\n\nrequired\n\n# ðŸ”‘ API Credits\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/get-remaining-credits)\n\nGet Timestamped Lyrics\n\ncURL\n\n```\ncurl --request POST \\\n  --url https://api.sunoapi.org/api/v1/generate/get-timestamped-lyrics \\\n  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <token>' \\\n  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n  --data '\n{\n  \"taskId\": \"5c79****be8e\",\n  \"audioId\": \"e231****-****-****-****-****8cadc7dc\"\n}\n'\n```\n\n200\n\n```\n{\n  \"code\": 200,\n  \"msg\": \"success\",\n  \"data\": {\n    \"alignedWords\": [\n      {\n        \"word\": \"[Verse]\\nWaggin'\",\n        \"success\": true,\n        \"startS\": 1.36,\n        \"endS\": 1.79,\n        \"palign\": 0\n      }\n    ],\n    \"waveformData\": [\n      0,\n      1,\n      0.5,\n      0.75\n    ],\n    \"hootCer\": 0.3803191489361702,\n    \"isStreamed\": false\n  }\n}\n```\n\nPOST\n\n/\n\napi\n\n/\n\nv1\n\n/\n\ngenerate\n\n/\n\nget-timestamped-lyrics\n\nTry it\n\nGet Timestamped Lyrics\n\ncURL\n\n```\ncurl --request POST \\\n  --url https://api.sunoapi.org/api/v1/generate/get-timestamped-lyrics \\\n  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <token>' \\\n  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n  --data '\n{\n  \"taskId\": \"5c79****be8e\",\n  \"audioId\": \"e231****-****-****-****-****8cadc7dc\"\n}\n'\n```\n\n200\n\n```\n{\n  \"code\": 200,\n  \"msg\": \"success\",\n  \"data\": {\n    \"alignedWords\": [\n      {\n        \"word\": \"[Verse]\\nWaggin'\",\n        \"success\": true,\n        \"startS\": 1.36,\n        \"endS\": 1.79,\n        \"palign\": 0\n      }\n    ],\n    \"waveformData\": [\n      0,\n      1,\n      0.5,\n      0.75\n    ],\n    \"hootCer\": 0.3803191489361702,\n    \"isStreamed\": false\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### \n\n[â€‹\n\n](#parameter-selection-logic)\n\nParameter Selection Logic\n\n1.  audioId parameter:\n    *   The audioId parameter is required to identify the exact track\n    *   Provides a unique identifier for the audio track within the generation task\n\n### \n\n[â€‹\n\n](#developer-notes)\n\nDeveloper Notes\n\n1.  Timestamp values are in seconds\n2.  Returned waveform data can be used for audio visualization\n3.  For instrumental tracks (generated with instrumental=true), no lyrics data will be available\n4.  Typical use case: Karaoke-style lyrics display in music player interfaces\n\n#### Authorizations\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#authorization-authorization)\n\nAuthorization\n\nstring\n\nheader\n\nrequired\n\n# ðŸ”‘ API Authentication\n\nAll endpoints require authentication using Bearer Token.\n\n## Get API Key\n\n1.  Visit the [API Key Management Page](https://sunoapi.org/api-key) to obtain your API Key\n\n## Usage\n\nAdd to request headers:\n\n```\nAuthorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY\n```\n\n> âš ï¸ Note:\n> \n> *   Keep your API Key secure and do not share it with others\n> *   If you suspect your API Key has been compromised, reset it immediately from the management page\n\n#### Body\n\napplication/json\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-task-id)\n\ntaskId\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nThe task ID of the music generation task. Required to identify which generation task contains the lyrics.\n\nExample:\n\n`\"5c79****be8e\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-audio-id)\n\naudioId\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nAudio ID of the track to retrieve lyrics for.\n\nExample:\n\n`\"e231****-****-****-****-****8cadc7dc\"`\n\n#### Response\n\n200\n\napplication/json\n\nRequest successful\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-code)\n\ncode\n\nenum<integer>\n\n# Status Codes\n\n*   âœ… 200 - Request successful\n*   âš ï¸ 400 - Invalid parameters\n*   âš ï¸ 401 - Unauthorized access\n*   âš ï¸ 404 - Invalid request method or path\n*   âš ï¸ 405 - Rate limit exceeded\n*   âš ï¸ 413 - Theme or prompt too long\n*   âš ï¸ 429 - Insufficient credits\n*   âš ï¸ 430 - Your call frequency is too high. Please try again later.\n*   âš ï¸ 455 - System maintenance\n*   âŒ 500 - Server error\n\nAvailable options:\n\n`200`,\n\n`400`,\n\n`401`,\n\n`404`,\n\n`405`,\n\n`413`,\n\n`429`,\n\n`430`,\n\n`455`,\n\n`500`\n\nExample:\n\n`200`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-msg)\n\nmsg\n\nstring\n\nError message when code != 200\n\nExample:\n\n`\"success\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-data)\n\ndata\n\nobject\n\nShow child attributes\n\n[Get Music Generation Details](/suno-api/get-music-generation-details)[Boost Music Style](/suno-api/boost-music-style)\n\n---\n\n## Source: https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/get-remaining-credits\n\n# Get Remaining Credits - Suno API\n\nGet Remaining Credits\n\nAccount Management\n\nRetrieve the current balance of available credits for your account.\n\n### Usage Guide\n\n*   Credits are consumed when generating music, lyrics, or using other processing features.\n*   This endpoint allows you to check your current credit balance before initiating tasks.\n*   Returns a single integer value representing your available credits.\n*   No parameters required; authentication via API key is sufficient.\n\n### Developer Notes\n\n1.  Monitor your credit balance regularly to avoid service interruptions.\n2.  If credits are insufficient, generation tasks will fail with error code 429.\n3.  Consider integrating this check before starting expensive generation operations.\n4.  This endpoint is lightweight and can be called frequently as needed.\n\nAuthorization\n\nstring\n\nheader\n\nrequired\n\n## ðŸ”‘ API Authentication\n\nAll endpoints require authentication using Bearer Token.\n\n## Get API Key\n\n1.  Visit the [API Key Management Page](https://sunoapi.org/api-key) to obtain your API Key\n\n## Usage\n\nAdd to request headers:\n\n```\nAuthorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY\n```\n\n> âš ï¸ Note:\n> \n> *   Keep your API Key secure and do not share it with others\n> *   If you suspect your API Key has been compromised, reset it immediately from the management page\n\nRequest successful\n\ncode\n\nenum<integer>\n\n## Status Codes\n\n*   âœ… 200 - Request successful\n*   âš ï¸ 400 - Invalid parameters\n*   âš ï¸ 401 - Unauthorized access\n*   âš ï¸ 404 - Invalid request method or path\n*   âš ï¸ 405 - Rate limit exceeded\n*   âš ï¸ 413 - Theme or prompt too long\n*   âš ï¸ 429 - Insufficient credits\n*   âš ï¸ 430 - Your call frequency is too high. Please try again later.\n*   âš ï¸ 455 - System maintenance\n*   âŒ 500 - Server error\n\nAvailable options\n\n:\n\n`200`,\n\n`400`,\n\n`401`,\n\n`404`,\n\n`405`,\n\n`413`,\n\n`429`,\n\n`430`,\n\n`455`,\n\n`500`\n\nExample:\n\n`200`\n\nmsg\n\nstring\n\nError message when code != 200\n\nExample:\n\n`\"success\"`\n\ndata\n\ninteger\n\nThe number of credits currently available in your account.\n\n*   Each API operation consumes a specific number of credits depending on the feature.\n*   Additional credits can be purchased from your account dashboard.\n\nExample:\n\n`100`\n\n[Get Music Video Details](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/get-music-video-details)[File Upload API Quickstart](https://docs.sunoapi.org/file-upload-api/quickstart)\n\n---\n\n## Source: https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/get-vocal-separation-details\n\n# Get Audio Separation Details - Suno API\n\n### Status Descriptions\n\n*   PENDING: Task is waiting to be processed\n*   SUCCESS: Vocal separation completed successfully\n*   CREATE\\_TASK\\_FAILED: Failed to create the separation task\n*   GENERATE\\_AUDIO\\_FAILED: Failed to perform vocal separation\n*   CALLBACK\\_EXCEPTION: Error occurred during callback\n\n### Return Data Description\n\nBased on the separation type you selected during generation, the audio URL fields included in the response will vary:\n\n#### separate\\_vocal Type Return Fields\n\nWhen status is SUCCESS, the response includes the following download URLs:\n\n*   `originUrl`: Original mixed track\n*   `instrumentalUrl`: Instrumental track without vocals\n*   `vocalUrl`: Isolated vocals only track\n\n#### split\\_stem Type Return Fields\n\nWhen status is SUCCESS, the response includes the following download URLs:\n\n*   `originUrl`: Original mixed track\n*   `vocalUrl`: Isolated vocals only track\n*   `backingVocalsUrl`: Isolated backing vocals track\n*   `drumsUrl`: Isolated drums track\n*   `bassUrl`: Isolated bass track\n*   `guitarUrl`: Isolated guitar track\n*   `keyboardUrl`: Isolated keyboard track\n*   `percussionUrl`: Isolated percussion track\n*   `stringsUrl`: Isolated strings track\n*   `synthUrl`: Isolated synthesizer track\n*   `fxUrl`: Isolated effects track\n*   `brassUrl`: Isolated brass track\n*   `woodwindsUrl`: Isolated woodwinds track\n\n### Developer Notes\n\n*   Use this endpoint to check separation status instead of waiting for callbacks\n*   Task creation and completion times are included in the response\n*   Different separation types return different combinations of audio fields\n*   Audio URLs are only returned when the task is successfully completed\n*   Audio file URLs have time limits, recommend downloading and saving promptly\n*   `separate_vocal` type returns `instrumentalUrl` and `vocalUrl` fields, other instrument fields are null\n*   `split_stem` type returns detailed instrument separation fields, `instrumentalUrl` is null\n\n## ðŸ”‘ API Authentication\n\nAll endpoints require authentication using Bearer Token.\n\n## Get API Key\n\n1.  Visit the [API Key Management Page](https://sunoapi.org/api-key) to obtain your API Key\n\n## Usage\n\nAdd to request headers:\n\n```\nAuthorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY\n```\n\n> âš ï¸ Note:\n> \n> *   Keep your API Key secure and do not share it with others\n> *   If you suspect your API Key has been compromised, reset it immediately from the management page\n\ntaskId\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nThe task ID returned from the Separate Vocals from Music endpoint. Used to retrieve detailed information about a specific vocal separation task, including download URLs for all separated audio components.\n\nRequest successful\n\ncode\n\nenum<integer>\n\n## Status Codes\n\n*   âœ… 200 - Request successful\n*   âš ï¸ 400 - Invalid parameters\n*   âš ï¸ 401 - Unauthorized access\n*   âš ï¸ 404 - Invalid request method or path\n*   âš ï¸ 405 - Rate limit exceeded\n*   âš ï¸ 413 - Theme or prompt too long\n*   âš ï¸ 429 - Insufficient credits\n*   âš ï¸ 430 - Your call frequency is too high. Please try again later.\n*   âš ï¸ 455 - System maintenance\n*   âŒ 500 - Server error\n\nAvailable options\n\n:\n\n`200`,\n\n`400`,\n\n`401`,\n\n`404`,\n\n`405`,\n\n`413`,\n\n`429`,\n\n`430`,\n\n`455`,\n\n`500`\n\nExample:\n\n`200`\n\nmsg\n\nstring\n\nError message when code != 200\n\nExample:\n\n`\"success\"`\n\ndata\n\nobject\n\nShow child attributes\n\n---\n\n## Source: https://docs.sunoapi.org/cn/suno-api/get-music-generation-details\n\n# èŽ·å–éŸ³ä¹ç”Ÿæˆè¯¦æƒ… - Suno https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/get-wav-conversion-details\n\n# Get WAV Conversion Details - Suno API\n\n[![light logo](https://sunoapi.org/logo.png)![dark logo](https://sunoapi.org/logo.png)](/)\n\n![US](https://d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net/flags/US.svg)\n\nEnglish\n\nSearch...\n\nâŒ˜K\n\nWAV Conversion\n\nGet WAV Conversion Details\n\n*   [\n    \n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/quickstart)\n\n*   [POST\n    \n    Generate Suno AI Music\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/generate-music)\n*   [\n    \n    Music Generation Callbacks\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/generate-music-callbacks)\n*   [POST\n    \n    Extend Music\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/extend-music)\n*   [\n    \n    Music Extension Callbacks\n    \n    \n    \n  \n    \n    ](/suno-api/cover-suno)\n*   [\n    \n    Music Cover Generation Callbacks\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/cover-suno-callbacks)\n*   [POST\n    \n    Replace Music Section\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/replace-section)\n*   [\n    \n    Replace Music Section Callbacks\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/replace-section-callbacks)\n*   [GET\n    \n    Get Music Cover Details\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/get-cover-suno-details)\n*   [POST\n    \n    Generate Persona\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/generate-persona)\n\n*   [POST\n    \n    Generate Lyrics\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/generate-lyrics)\n*   [\n    \n    Lyrics Generation Callbacks\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/generate-lyrics-callbacks)\n*   [GET\n    \n    Get Lyrics Generation Details\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/get-lyrics-generation-details)\n\n*   [POST\n    \n    Convert to WAV Format\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/convert-to-wav-format)\n*   [\n    \n    WAV Format Conversion Callbacks\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/convert-to-wav-format-callbacks)\n*   [GET\n    \n    Get WAV Conversion Details\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/get-wav-conversion-details)\n\n*   [POST\n    \n    Vocalâ€¯&â€¯Instrument Stem Separation\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/separate-vocals-from-music)\n*   [\n    \n    Audio Separation Callbacks\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/separate-vocals-from-music-callbacks)\n*   [GET\n    \n    Get Audio Separation Details\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/get-vocal-separation-details)\n\n*   [POST\n    \n    Create Music Video\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/create-music-video)\n*   [\n    \n    Music Video Generation Callbacks\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/create-music-video-callbacks)\n*   [GET\n    \n    Get Music Video Details\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/get-music-video-details)\n\n*   [GET\n    \n    Get Remaining Credits\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/get-remaining-credits)\n\nGet WAV Conversion Details\n\ncURL\n\n```\ncurl --request GET \\\n  --url https://api.sunoapi.org/api/v1/wav/record-info \\\n  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <token>'\n```\n\n200\n\n```\n{\n  \"code\": 200,\n  \"msg\": \"success\",\n  \"data\": {\n    \"taskId\": \"988e****c8d3\",\n    \"musicId\": \"8551****662c\",\n    \"musicIndex\": 0,\n    \"callbackUrl\": \"https://api.example.com/callback\",\n    \"completeTime\": \"2025-01-01 00:10:00\",\n    \"response\": {\n      \"audioWavUrl\": \"https://example.com/s/04e6****e727.wav\"\n    },\n    \"successFlag\": \"SUCCESS\",\n    \"createTime\": \"2025-01-01 00:00:00\",\n    \"errorCode\": null,\n    \"errorMessage\": null\n  }\n}\n```\n\nGET\n\n/\n\napi\n\n/\n\nv1\n\n/\n\nwav\n\n/\n\nrecord-info\n\nTry it\n\nGet WAV Conversion Details\n\ncURL\n\n```\ncurl --request GET \\\n  --url https://api.sunoapi.org/api/v1/wav/record-info \\\n  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <token>'\n```\n\n200\n\n```\n{\n  \"code\": 200,\n  \"msg\": \"success\",\n  \"data\": {\n    \"taskId\": \"988e****c8d3\",\n    \"musicId\": \"8551****662c\",\n    \"musicIndex\": 0,\n    \"callbackUrl\": \"https://api.example.com/callback\",\n    \"completeTime\": \"2025-01-01 00:10:00\",\n    \"response\": {\n      \"audioWavUrl\": \"https://example.com/s/04e6****e727.wav\"\n    },\n    \"successFlag\": \"SUCCESS\",\n    \"createTime\": \"2025-01-01 00:00:00\",\n    \"errorCode\": null,\n    \"errorMessage\": null\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### \n\n[â€‹\n\n](#status-descriptions)\n\nStatus Descriptions\n\n*   PENDING: Task is waiting to be processed\n*   SUCCESS: WAV conversion completed successfully\n*   CREATE\\_TASK\\_FAILED: Failed to create the conversion task\n*   GENERATE\\_WAV\\_FAILED: Failed to convert to WAV format\n*   CALLBACK\\_EXCEPTION: Error occurred during callback\n\n### \n\n[â€‹\n\n](#developer-notes)\n\nDeveloper Notes\n\n*   Use this endpoint to check conversion status instead of waiting for callbacks\n*   The response includes the WAV file download URL when status is SUCCESS\n*   Task creation and completion times are included in the response\n\n#### Authorizations\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#authorization-authorization)\n\nAuthorization\n\nstring\n\nheader\n\nrequired\n\n# ðŸ”‘ API Authentication\n\nAll endpoints require authentication using Bearer Token.\n\n## Get API Key\n\n1.  Visit the [API Key Management Page](https://sunoapi.org/api-key) to obtain your API Key\n\n## Usage\n\nAdd to request headers:\n\n```\nAuthorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY\n```\n\n> âš ï¸ Note:\n> \n> *   Keep your API Key secure and do not share it with others\n> *   If you suspect your API Key has been compromised, reset it immediately from the management page\n\n#### Query Parameters\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#parameter-task-id)\n\ntaskId\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nThe task ID returned from the Convert to WAV Format endpoint. Used to retrieve details about the conversion process, including status and download URL if available.\n\n#### Response\n\n200\n\napplication/json\n\nRequest successful\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-code)\n\ncode\n\nenum<integer>\n\n# Status Codes\n\n*   âœ… 200 - Request successful\n*   âš ï¸ 400 - Invalid parameters\n*   âš ï¸ 401 - Unauthorized access\n*   âš ï¸ 404 - Invalid request method or path\n*   âš ï¸ 405 - Rate limit exceeded\n*   âš ï¸ 409 - Conflict - WAV record already exists\n*   âš ï¸ 413 - Theme or prompt too long\n*   âš ï¸ 429 - Insufficient credits\n*   âš ï¸ 430 - Your call frequency is too high. Please try again later.\n*   âš ï¸ 455 - System maintenance\n*   âŒ 500 - Server error\n\nAvailable options:\n\n`200`,\n\n`400`,\n\n`401`,\n\n`404`,\n\n`405`,\n\n`409`,\n\n`413`,\n\n`429`,\n\n`430`,\n\n`455`,\n\n`500`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-msg)\n\nmsg\n\nstring\n\nError message when code != 200\n\nExample:\n\n`\"success\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-data)\n\ndata\n\nobject\n\nShow child attributes\n\n[WAV Format Conversion Callbacks](/suno-api/convert-to-wav-format-callbacks)[Vocalâ€¯&â€¯Instrument Stem Separation](/suno-api/separate-vocals-from-music)\n\n---\n\n## Source: https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/quickstart\n\n# Suno API Quick Start - Suno API\n\n## Welcome to Suno API\n\nSuno API is powered by advanced AI models to provide comprehensive music generation and audio processing services. Whether you need music creation, lyrics generation, audio editing, or vocal separation, our API meets all your creative needs.\n\n## Authentication\n\nAll API requests require authentication using a Bearer token. Please obtain your API key from the [API Key Management page](https://sunoapi.org/api-key).\n\n### API Base URL\n\n```\nhttps://api.sunoapi.org\n```\n\n```\nAuthorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY\n```\n\n## Quick Start Guide\n\n### Step 1: Generate Your First Song\n\nStart with a simple music generation request:\n\n### Step 2: Check Task Status\n\nUse the returned task ID to check generation status:\n\n### Response Format\n\n**Success Response:**\n\n```\n{\n  \"code\": 200,\n  \"msg\": \"success\",\n  \"data\": {\n    \"taskId\": \"suno_task_abc123\"\n  }\n}\n```\n\n**Task Status Response:**\n\n```\n{\n  \"code\": 200,\n  \"msg\": \"success\",\n  \"data\": {\n    \"taskId\": \"suno_task_abc123\",\n    \"status\": \"SUCCESS\",\n    \"response\": {\n      \"data\": [\n        {\n          \"id\": \"audio_123\",\n          \"audio_url\": \"https://example.com/generated-music.mp3\",\n          \"title\": \"Generated Song\",\n          \"tags\": \"folk, acoustic\",\n          \"duration\": 180.5\n        }\n      ]\n    }\n  }\n}\n```\n\n## Core Features\n\n### Music Generation\n\nCreate complete songs from text descriptions:\n\n```\n{\n  \"prompt\": \"An upbeat electronic dance track with synth leads\",\n  \"customMode\": true,\n  \"style\": \"Electronic Dance\",\n  \"title\": \"Digital Dreams\",\n  \"instrumental\": false,\n  \"model\": \"V4_5\"\n}\n```\n\n### Lyrics Creation\n\nGenerate AI-powered lyrics independently:\n\n```\n{\n  \"prompt\": \"A song about overcoming challenges and finding inner strength\",\n  \"callBackUrl\": \"https://your-server.com/lyrics-callback\"\n}\n```\n\n### Audio Extension\n\nExtend existing music tracks:\n\n```\n{\n  \"audioId\": \"e231****-****-****-****-****8cadc7dc\",\n  \"defaultParamFlag\": true,\n  \"prompt\": \"Continue with a guitar solo\",\n  \"continueAt\": 120,\n  \"model\": \"V4_5ALL\"\n}\n```\n\n### Upload and Cover\n\nTransform existing audio with new styles:\n\n```\n{\n  \"uploadUrl\": \"https://example.com/original-audio.mp3\",\n  \"customMode\": true,\n  \"style\": \"Jazz\",\n  \"title\": \"Jazz Version\",\n  \"prompt\": \"Transform into smooth jazz style\"\n}\n```\n\n## Model Versions\n\nChoose the right model for your needs:\n\n## Key Parameters\n\nprompt\n\nstring\n\nText description for music generation. Provide detailed, specific descriptions for better results.**Character limits by model:**\n\n*   V4: Maximum 3000 characters\n*   V4\\_5, V4\\_5PLUS, V4\\_5ALL, V5: Maximum 5000 characters\n\n**Prompt Tips:**\n\n*   Describe musical style and genre\n*   Include mood and atmosphere\n*   Specify instruments and vocals\n*   Add tempo and energy descriptions\n\nmodel\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nModel version to use:\n\n*   `V4` - Best audio quality, up to 4 minutes\n*   `V4_5` - Advanced features, up to 8 minutes\n*   `V4_5PLUS` - Richer sound, up to 8 minutes\n*   `V4_5ALL` - V4.5-all is better song structure, max 8 min\n*   `V5` - Faster generation with superior musicality, up to 8 minutes\n\ncustomMode\n\nboolean\n\nEnable custom parameter mode for advanced control. When `true`, requires additional parameters like `style` and `title`.\n\ninstrumental\n\nboolean\n\nGenerate instrumental-only music without vocals. Default is `false`.\n\nstyle\n\nstring\n\nMusic style or genre (required in custom mode). Examples: â€œJazzâ€, â€œRockâ€, â€œClassicalâ€, â€œElectronicâ€**Character limits by model:**\n\n*   V4: Maximum 200 characters\n*   V4\\_5, V4\\_5PLUS, V4\\_5ALL, V5: Maximum 1000 characters\n\ntitle\n\nstring\n\nSong title (required in custom mode). Character limits by model:\n\n*   V4 & V4\\_5ALL: Maximum 80 characters\n*   V4\\_5, V4\\_5PLUS, V5: Maximum 100 characters\n\ncallBackUrl\n\nstring\n\nURL to receive completion notifications. See callback documentation for details.\n\n## Complete Workflow Example\n\nHereâ€™s a complete music generation and processing example:\n\n*   JavaScript\n    \n*   Python\n    \n\n```\nclass SunoAPI {\n  constructor(apiKey) {\n    this.apiKey = apiKey;\n    this.baseUrl = 'https://api.sunoapi.org/api/v1';\n  }\n  \n  async generateMusic(options) {\n    const response = await fetch(`${this.baseUrl}/generate`, {\n      method: 'POST',\n      headers: {\n        'Authorization': `Bearer ${this.apiKey}`,\n        'Content-Type': 'application/json'\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify(options)\n    });\n    \n    const result = await response.json();\n    if (result.code !== 200) {\n      throw new Error(`Generation failed: ${result.msg}`);\n    }\n    \n    return result.data.taskId;\n  }\n  \n  async generateLyrics(prompt) {\n    const response = await fetch(`${this.baseUrl}/lyrics`, {\n      method: 'POST',\n      headers: {\n        'Authorization': `Bearer ${this.apiKey}`,\n        'Content-Type': 'application/json'\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        prompt,\n        callBackUrl: 'https://your-server.com/lyrics-callback'\n      })\n    });\n    \n    const result = await response.json();\n    return result.data.taskId;\n  }\n  \n  async waitForCompletion(taskId, maxWaitTime = 600000) { // 10 minutes max\n    const startTime = Date.now();\n    \n    while (Date.now() - startTime < maxWaitTime) {\n      const status = await this.getTaskStatus(taskId);\n      \n      if (status.status === 'SUCCESS') {\n        return status.response;\n      } else if (status.status === 'FAILED') {\n        throw new Error(`Generation failed: ${status.errorMessage}`);\n      }\n      \n      // Wait 30 seconds before checking again\n      await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 30000));\n    }\n    \n    throw new Error('Generation timeout');\n  }\n  \n  async getTaskStatus(taskId) {\n    const response = await fetch(`${this.baseUrl}/generate/record-info?taskId=${taskId}`, {\n      headers: {\n        'Authorization': `Bearer ${this.apiKey}`\n      }\n    });\n    \n    const result = await response.json();\n    return result.data;\n  }\n  \n  async extendMusic(audioId, options) {\n    const response = await fetch(`${this.baseUrl}/generate/extend`, {\n      method: 'POST',\n      headers: {\n        'Authorization': `Bearer ${this.apiKey}`,\n        'Content-Type': 'application/json'\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        audioId,\n        ...options\n      })\n    });\n    \n    const result = await response.json();\n    return result.data.taskId;\n  }\n  \n  async separateVocals(taskId, audioId) {\n    const response = await fetch(`${this.baseUrl}/vocal-removal/generate`, {\n      method: 'POST',\n      headers: {\n        'Authorization': `Bearer ${this.apiKey}`,\n        'Content-Type': 'application/json'\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        taskId,\n        audioId,\n        callBackUrl: 'https://your-server.com/vocal-callback'\n      })\n    });\n    \n    const result = await response.json();\n    return result.data.taskId;\n  }\n  \n  async getRemainingCredits() {\n    const response = await fetch(`${this.baseUrl}/get-credits`, {\n      headers: {\n        'Authorization': `Bearer ${this.apiKey}`\n      }\n    });\n    \n    const result = await response.json();\n    return result.data.credits;\n  }\n}\n\n// Usage example\nasync function main() {\n  const api = new SunoAPI('YOUR_API_KEY');\n  \n  try {\n    // Check remaining credits\n    const credits = await api.getRemainingCredits();\n    console.log(`Remaining credits: ${credits}`);\n    \n    // Generate lyrics first\n    console.log('Generating lyrics...');\n    const lyricsTaskId = await api.generateLyrics(\n      'A song about adventure and discovery, uplifting and inspiring'\n    );\n    \n    const lyricsResult = await api.waitForCompletion(lyricsTaskId);\n    console.log('Lyrics generated:', lyricsResult.data[0].text);\n    \n    // Generate music with custom parameters\n    console.log('Generating music...');\n    const musicTaskId = await api.generateMusic({\n      prompt: lyricsResult.data[0].text,\n      customMode: true,\n      style: 'Folk Pop',\n      title: 'Adventure Song',\n      instrumental: false,\n      model: 'V4_5',\n      callBackUrl: 'https://your-server.com/music-callback'\n    });\n    \n    // Wait for completion\n    const musicResult = await api.waitForCompletion(musicTaskId);\n    console.log('Music generated successfully!');\n    \n    musicResult.data.forEach((track, index) => {\n      console.log(`Track ${index + 1}:`);\n      console.log(`  Title: ${track.title}`);\n      console.log(`  Duration: ${track.duration}s`);\n      console.log(`  Audio URL: ${track.audio_url}`);\n    });\n    \n    // Extend the first track\n    const originalTrack = musicResult.data[0];\n    console.log('Extending music...');\n    const extendTaskId = await api.extendMusic(originalTrack.id, {\n      defaultParamFlag: true,\n      prompt: 'Continue with a beautiful instrumental outro',\n      continueAt: originalTrack.duration - 30, // Extend from 30s before end\n      model: 'V4_5'\n    });\n    \n    const extendedResult = await api.waitForCompletion(extendTaskId);\n    console.log('Extended version created:', extendedResult.data[0].audio_url);\n    \n    // Separate vocals\n    console.log('Separating vocals...');\n    const separationTaskId = await api.separateVocals(musicTaskId, originalTrack.id);\n    const separationResult = await api.waitForCompletion(separationTaskId);\n    \n    console.log('Vocal separation completed:');\n    console.log(`  Instrumental: ${separationResult.vocal_removal_info.instrumental_url}`);\n    console.log(`  Vocals only: ${separationResult.vocal_removal_info.vocal_url}`);\n    \n  } catch (error) {\n    console.error('Error:', error.message);\n  }\n}\n\nmain();\n```\n\n```\nimport requests\nimport time\n\nclass SunoAPI:\n    def __init__(self, api_key):\n        self.api_key = api_key\n        self.base_url = 'https://api.sunoapi.org/api/v1'\n        self.headers = {\n            'Authorization': f'Bearer {api_key}',\n            'Content-Type': 'application/json'\n        }\n    \n    def generate_music(self, **options):\n        response = requests.post(f'{self.base_url}/generate', \n                               headers=self.headers, json=options)\n        result = response.json()\n        \n        if result['code'] != 200:\n            raise Exception(f\"Generation failed: {result['msg']}\")\n        \n        return result['data']['taskId']\n    \n    def generate_lyrics(self, prompt):\n        response = requests.post(f'{self.base_url}/lyrics',\n                               headers=self.headers,\n                               json={\n                                   'prompt': prompt,\n                                   'callBackUrl': 'https://your-server.com/lyrics-callback'\n                               })\n        result = response.json()\n        return result['data']['taskId']\n    \n    def wait_for_completion(self, task_id, max_wait_time=600):\n        start_time = time.time()\n        \n        while time.time() - start_time < max_wait_time:\n            status = self.get_task_status(task_id)\n            \n            if status['status'] == 'SUCCESS':\n                return status['response']\n            elif status['status'] == 'FAILED':\n                raise Exception(f\"Generation failed: {status.get('errorMessage')}\")\n            \n            time.sleep(30)  # Wait 30 seconds\n        \n        raise Exception('Generation timeout')\n    \n    def get_task_status(self, task_id):\n        response = requests.get(f'{self.base_url}/generate/record-info?taskId={task_id}',\n                              headers={'Authorization': f'Bearer {self.api_key}'})\n        return response.json()['data']\n    \n    def extend_music(self, audio_id, **options):\n        response = requests.post(f'{self.base_url}/generate/extend',\n                               headers=self.headers,\n                               json={'audioId': audio_id, **options})\n        return response.json()['data']['taskId']\n    \n    def separate_vocals(self, task_id, audio_id):\n        response = requests.post(f'{self.base_url}/vocal-removal/generate',\n                               headers=self.headers,\n                               json={\n                                   'taskId': task_id,\n                                   'audioId': audio_id,\n                                   'callBackUrl': 'https://your-server.com/vocal-callback'\n                               })\n        return response.json()['data']['taskId']\n    \n    def get_remaining_credits(self):\n        response = requests.get(f'{self.base_url}/get-credits',\n                              headers={'Authorization': f'Bearer {self.api_key}'})\n        return response.json()['data']['credits']\n\n# Usage example\ndef main():\n    api = SunoAPI('YOUR_API_KEY')\n    \n    try:\n        # Check remaining credits\n        credits = api.get_remaining_credits()\n        print(f'Remaining credits: {credits}')\n        \n        # Generate lyrics first\n        print('Generating lyrics...')\n        lyrics_task_id = api.generate_lyrics(\n            'A song about adventure and discovery, uplifting and inspiring'\n        )\n        \n        lyrics_result = api.wait_for_completion(lyrics_task_id)\n        print('Lyrics generated:', lyrics_result['data'][0]['text'])\n        \n        # Generate music with custom parameters\n        print('Generating music...')\n        music_task_id = api.generate_music(\n            prompt=lyrics_result['data'][0]['text'],\n            customMode=True,\n            style='Folk Pop',\n            title='Adventure Song',\n            instrumental=False,\n            model='V4_5',\n            callBackUrl='https://your-server.com/music-callback'\n        )\n        \n        # Wait for completion\n        music_result = api.wait_for_completion(music_task_id)\n        print('Music generated successfully!')\n        \n        for i, track in enumerate(music_result['data']):\n            print(f'Track {i + 1}:')\n            print(f'  Title: {track[\"title\"]}')\n            print(f'  Duration: {track[\"duration\"]}s')\n            print(f'  Audio URL: {track[\"audio_url\"]}')\n        \n        # Extend the first track\n        original_track = music_result['data'][0]\n        print('Extending music...')\n        extend_task_id = api.extend_music(\n            original_track['id'],\n            defaultParamFlag=True,\n            prompt='Continue with a beautiful instrumental outro',\n            continueAt=original_track['duration'] - 30,\n            model='V4_5'\n        )\n        \n        extended_result = api.wait_for_completion(extend_task_id)\n        print('Extended version created:', extended_result['data'][0]['audio_url'])\n        \n        # Separate vocals\n        print('Separating vocals...')\n        separation_task_id = api.separate_vocals(music_task_id, original_track['id'])\n        separation_result = api.wait_for_completion(separation_task_id)\n        \n        print('Vocal separation completed:')\n        vocal_info = separation_result['vocal_removal_info']\n        print(f'  Instrumental: {vocal_info[\"instrumental_url\"]}')\n        print(f'  Vocals only: {vocal_info[\"vocal_url\"]}')\n        \n    except Exception as error:\n        print(f'Error: {error}')\n\nif __name__ == '__main__':\n    main()\n```\n\n## Advanced Features\n\n### Upload and Extend\n\nUpload your own audio and extend it with AI:\n\n```\nconst extendTaskId = await api.generateMusic({\n  uploadUrl: 'https://example.com/my-song.mp3',\n  defaultParamFlag: true,\n  prompt: 'Add a rock guitar solo section',\n  continueAt: 60,\n  model: 'V4_5'\n});\n```\n\n### Audio Format Conversion\n\nConvert music to high-quality WAV format:\n\n```\nconst wavTaskId = await api.convertToWav({\n  taskId: 'original_task_id',\n  audioId: 'e231****-****-****-****-****8cadc7dc',\n  callBackUrl: 'https://your-server.com/wav-callback'\n});\n```\n\n### Music Video Generation\n\nCreate visual music videos:\n\n```\nconst videoTaskId = await api.createMusicVideo({\n  taskId: 'music_task_id',\n  audioId: 'e231****-****-****-****-****8cadc7dc',\n  author: 'Artist Name',\n  domainName: 'your-brand.com',\n  callBackUrl: 'https://your-server.com/video-callback'\n});\n```\n\n### Using Callbacks\n\nSet up webhook callbacks for automatic notifications:\n\n```\n// Your callback endpoint\napp.post('/music-callback', (req, res) => {\n  const { code, data } = req.body;\n  \n  if (code === 200) {\n    console.log('Music ready:', data.data);\n    data.data.forEach(track => {\n      console.log(`Title: ${track.title}`);\n      console.log(`Audio: ${track.audio_url}`);\n    });\n  } else {\n    console.log('Generation failed:', req.body.msg);\n  }\n  \n  res.status(200).json({ status: 'received' });\n});\n```\n\n[\n\n## Learn More About Callbacks\n\nSet up webhook callbacks to receive automatic notifications when your music is ready.\n\n\n\n](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/generate-music-callbacks)\n\n## Task Status Explanation\n\nGENERATING\n\nProcessing\n\nTask is being processed\n\nSUCCESS\n\nCompleted\n\nTask completed successfully\n\nFAILED\n\nFailed\n\nTask failed to complete\n\nPENDING\n\nQueued\n\nTask is queued for processing\n\n## Best Practices\n\n## File Storage and Access\n\n*   Audio files remain accessible for 15 days after generation\n*   Download and save important files to your own storage\n*   Use the API to regenerate content if needed after expiration\n*   Consider implementing local backup strategies for critical content\n\n## Next Steps\n\n## Support\n\n---\n\nReady to start creating amazing AI music? [Get your API key](https://sunoapi.org/api-key) and begin composing today!\n\n---\n\n## Source: https://docs.sunoapi.org/cn/suno-api/get-music-video-details\n\n# èŽ·å–éŸ³ä¹è§†é¢‘è¯¦æƒ… - Suno \"988e****c8d3\",\n    \"musicId\": \"376c687e-d439-42c1-b1e4-bcb43b095ec2\",\n    \"musicIndex\": 0,\n    \"callbackUrl\": \"https://api.example.com/callback\",\n    \"completeTime\": \"2025-01-01 00:10:00\",\n    \"response\": {\n      \"videoUrl\": \"https://example.com/videos/video_847715e66259.mp4\"\n    },\n    \"successFlag\": \"SUCCESS\",\n    \"createTime\": \"2025-01-01 00:00:00\",\n    \"errorCode\": null,\n    \"errorMessage\": null\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### \n\n[â€‹\n\n](#çŠ¶æ€è¯´æ˜Ž)\n\nçŠ¶æ€è¯´æ˜Ž\n\n*   PENDING: ä»»åŠ¡ç­‰å¾…å¤„ç†ä¸­\n*   SUCCESS: è§†é¢‘ç”ŸæˆæˆåŠŸå®Œæˆ\n*   CREATE\\_TASK\\_FAILED: åˆ›å»ºè§†é¢‘ä»»åŠ¡å¤±è´¥\n*   GENERATE\\_MP4\\_FAILED: MP4ç”Ÿæˆå¤±è´¥\n*   CALLBACK\\_EXCEPTION: å›žè°ƒå¼‚å¸¸\n\n#### æŽˆæƒ\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#authorization-authorization)\n\nAuthorization\n\nstring\n\nheader\n\nå¿…å¡«\n\n# ðŸ”‘ API è®¤è¯è¯´æ˜Ž\n\næ‰€æœ‰æŽ¥å£éƒ½éœ€è¦é€šè¿‡ Bearer Token æ–¹å¼è¿›è¡Œè®¤è¯ã€‚\n\n## èŽ·å– API Key\n\n1.  è®¿é—® [API Key ç®¡ç†é¡µé¢](https://sunoapi.org/api-key) èŽ·å–æ‚¨çš„ API Key\n\n## ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹å¼\n\nåœ¨è¯·æ±‚å¤´ä¸­æ·»åŠ ï¼š\n\n```\nAuthorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY\n```\n\n> âš ï¸ æ³¨æ„ï¼š\n> \n> *   è¯·å¦¥å–„ä¿ç®¡æ‚¨çš„ API Keyï¼Œä¸è¦æ³„éœ²ç»™ä»–äºº\n> *   å¦‚æžœæ€€ç–‘ API Key æ³„éœ²ï¼Œè¯·ç«‹å³åœ¨ç®¡ç†é¡µé¢é‡ç½®\n\n#### æŸ¥è¯¢å‚æ•°\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#parameter-task-id)\n\ntaskId\n\nstring\n\nå¿…å¡«\n\nä»Ž 'åˆ›å»ºéŸ³ä¹è§†é¢‘' æŽ¥å£è¿”å›žçš„ä»»åŠ¡IDã€‚ç”¨äºŽèŽ·å–è§†é¢‘ç”Ÿæˆä»»åŠ¡çš„è¯¦ç»†ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬å¤„ç†çŠ¶æ€å’Œä¸‹è½½URLã€‚\n\n#### å“åº”\n\n200\n\napplication/json\n\nè¯·æ±‚æˆåŠŸ\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-code)\n\ncode\n\nenum<integer>\n\n# çŠ¶æ€ç è¯´æ˜Ž\n\n*   âœ… 200 - è¯·æ±‚æˆåŠŸ\n*   âš ï¸ 400 - å‚æ•°é”™è¯¯\n*   âš ï¸ 401 - æ²¡æœ‰è®¿é—®æƒé™\n*   âš ï¸ 404 - è¯·æ±‚æ–¹å¼æˆ–è€…è·¯å¾„é”™è¯¯\n*   âš ï¸ 405 - è°ƒç”¨è¶…è¿‡é™åˆ¶\n*   âš ï¸ 413 - ä¸»é¢˜æˆ–è€…promptè¿‡é•¿\n*   âš ï¸ 429 - ç§¯åˆ†ä¸è¶³\n*   âš ï¸ 430 - æ‚¨çš„è°ƒç”¨é¢‘çŽ‡è¿‡é«˜ï¼Œè¯·ç¨åŽå†è¯•ã€‚\n*   âš ï¸ 455 - ç½‘ç«™ç»´æŠ¤\n*   âŒ 500 - æœåŠ¡å™¨å¼‚å¸¸\n\nå¯ç”¨é€‰é¡¹:\n\n`200`,\n\n`400`,\n\n`401`,\n\n`404`,\n\n`405`,\n\n`413`,\n\n`429`,\n\n`430`,\n\n`455`,\n\n`500`\n\nç¤ºä¾‹:\n\n`200`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-msg)\n\nmsg\n\nstring\n\nå½“ code != 200 æ—¶ï¼Œå±•ç¤ºé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯\n\nç¤ºä¾‹:\n\n`\"success\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-data)\n\ndata\n\nobject\n\næ˜¾ç¤º å­å±žæ€§\n\n[éŸ³ä¹è§†é¢‘ç”Ÿæˆå›žè°ƒ](/cn/suno-api/create-music-video-callbacks)[èŽ·å–å‰©ä½™ç§¯åˆ†](/cn/suno-api/get-remaining-credits)\n\n---\n\n## Source:
