**è¶…æ—¶è®¾ç½®**: 15ç§’\n\n## å›žè°ƒè¯·æ±‚æ ¼å¼\n\nä»»åŠ¡å®Œæˆæ—¶ï¼Œç³»ç»Ÿä¼šæ ¹æ®æ‚¨é€‰æ‹©çš„åˆ†ç¦»ç±»åž‹å‘é€ä¸åŒæ ¼å¼çš„å›žè°ƒæ•°æ®ï¼š\n\n## çŠ¶æ€ç è¯´æ˜Ž\n\ncode\n\ninteger\n\nå¿…å¡«\n\nå›žè°ƒçŠ¶æ€ç ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºä»»åŠ¡å¤„ç†ç»“æžœï¼š\n\nçŠ¶æ€ç \n\nè¯´æ˜Ž\n\n200\n\næˆåŠŸ - äººå£°åˆ†ç¦»å®Œæˆ\n\n400\n\nè¯·æ±‚é”™è¯¯ - å‚æ•°é”™è¯¯ã€éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶æ ¼å¼ä¸æ”¯æŒç­‰\n\n451\n\nä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥ - æ— æ³•ä¸‹è½½æºéŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶\n\n500\n\næœåŠ¡å™¨é”™è¯¯ - è¯·ç¨åŽé‡è¯•\n\nmsg\n\nstring\n\nå¿…å¡«\n\nçŠ¶æ€æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œæä¾›è¯¦ç»†çš„çŠ¶æ€æè¿°\n\ndata.task\\_id\n\nstring\n\nå¿…å¡«\n\nä»»åŠ¡IDï¼Œä¸Žæ‚¨æäº¤ä»»åŠ¡æ—¶è¿”å›žçš„taskIdä¸€è‡´\n\ndata.vocal\\_removal\\_info\n\nobject\n\näººå£°åˆ†ç¦»ç»“æžœä¿¡æ¯ï¼ŒæˆåŠŸæ—¶è¿”å›ž\n\n## separate\\_vocalç±»åž‹å­—æ®µè¯´æ˜Ž\n\ndata.vocal\\_removal\\_info.origin\\_url\n\nstring\n\nåŽŸå§‹æ··éŸ³éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URL\n\ndata.vocal\\_removal\\_info.instrumental\\_url\n\nstring\n\nçº¯ä¼´å¥éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URLï¼ˆåŽ»é™¤äººå£°ï¼‰\n\ndata.vocal\\_removal\\_info.vocal\\_url\n\nstring\n\nçº¯äººå£°éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URLï¼ˆåŽ»é™¤ä¼´å¥ï¼‰\n\n## split\\_stemç±»åž‹å­—æ®µè¯´æ˜Ž\n\ndata.vocal\\_removal\\_info.origin\\_url\n\nstring\n\nåŽŸå§‹æ··éŸ³éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URL\n\ndata.vocal\\_removal\\_info.vocal\\_url\n\nstring\n\nçº¯äººå£°éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URL\n\ndata.vocal\\_removal\\_info.backing\\_vocals\\_url\n\nstring\n\nå’Œå£°éƒ¨åˆ†éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URL\n\ndata.vocal\\_removal\\_info.drums\\_url\n\nstring\n\né¼“å£°éƒ¨åˆ†éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URL\n\ndata.vocal\\_removal\\_info.bass\\_url\n\nstring\n\nè´æ–¯éƒ¨åˆ†éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URL\n\ndata.vocal\\_removal\\_info.guitar\\_url\n\nstring\n\nå‰ä»–éƒ¨åˆ†éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URL\n\ndata.vocal\\_removal\\_info.keyboard\\_url\n\nstring\n\né”®ç›˜éƒ¨åˆ†éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URL\n\ndata.vocal\\_removal\\_info.percussion\\_url\n\nstring\n\næ‰“å‡»ä¹éƒ¨åˆ†éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URL\n\ndata.vocal\\_removal\\_info.strings\\_url\n\nstring\n\nå¼¦ä¹éƒ¨åˆ†éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URL\n\ndata.vocal\\_removal\\_info.synth\\_url\n\nstring\n\nåˆæˆå™¨éƒ¨åˆ†éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URL\n\ndata.vocal\\_removal\\_info.fx\\_url\n\nstring\n\néŸ³æ•ˆéƒ¨åˆ†éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URL\n\ndata.vocal\\_removal\\_info.brass\\_url\n\nstring\n\né“œç®¡ä¹éƒ¨åˆ†éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URL\n\ndata.vocal\\_removal\\_info.woodwinds\\_url\n\nstring\n\næœ¨ç®¡ä¹éƒ¨åˆ†éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URL\n\n## å›žè°ƒæŽ¥æ”¶ç¤ºä¾‹\n\nä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯ä¸»æµç¼–ç¨‹è¯­è¨€æŽ¥æ”¶å›žè°ƒçš„ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç ï¼š\n\n*   Node.js\n    \n*   Python\n    \n*   PHP\n    \n\n```\nconst express = require('express');\nconst app = express();\n\napp.use(express.json());\n\napp.post('/vocal-separation-callback', (req, res) => {\n  const { code, msg, data } = req.body;\n  \n  console.log('æ”¶åˆ°äººå£°åˆ†ç¦»å›žè°ƒ:', {\n    taskId: data.task_id,\n    status: code,\n    message: msg\n  });\n  \n  if (code === 200) {\n    // ä»»åŠ¡æˆåŠŸå®Œæˆ\n    console.log('äººå£°åˆ†ç¦»å®Œæˆ');\n    const vocalInfo = data.vocal_removal_info;\n    \n    if (vocalInfo) {\n      console.log('åˆ†ç¦»ç»“æžœ:');\n      console.log(`  åŽŸå§‹éŸ³é¢‘: ${vocalInfo.origin_url}`);\n      \n      // æ ¹æ®ä¸åŒçš„åˆ†ç¦»ç±»åž‹å¤„ç†ä¸åŒçš„æ–‡ä»¶\n      if (vocalInfo.instrumental_url) {\n        // separate_vocal ç±»åž‹\n        console.log(`  çº¯ä¼´å¥: ${vocalInfo.instrumental_url}`);\n        console.log(`  çº¯äººå£°: ${vocalInfo.vocal_url}`);\n      } else {\n        // split_stem ç±»åž‹\n        console.log(`  äººå£°: ${vocalInfo.vocal_url}`);\n        console.log(`  å’Œå£°: ${vocalInfo.backing_vocals_url}`);\n        console.log(`  é¼“å£°: ${vocalInfo.drums_url}`);\n        console.log(`  è´æ–¯: ${vocalInfo.bass_url}`);\n        console.log(`  å‰ä»–: ${vocalInfo.guitar_url}`);\n        console.log(`  é”®ç›˜: ${vocalInfo.keyboard_url}`);\n        console.log(`  æ‰“å‡»ä¹: ${vocalInfo.percussion_url}`);\n        console.log(`  å¼¦ä¹: ${vocalInfo.strings_url}`);\n        console.log(`  åˆæˆå™¨: ${vocalInfo.synth_url}`);\n        console.log(`  éŸ³æ•ˆ: ${vocalInfo.fx_url}`);\n        console.log(`  é“œç®¡ä¹: ${vocalInfo.brass_url}`);\n        console.log(`  æœ¨ç®¡ä¹: ${vocalInfo.woodwinds_url}`);\n      }\n      \n      // ä¸‹è½½åˆ†ç¦»åŽçš„éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶\n      const https = require('https');\n      const fs = require('fs');\n      \n      const downloadFile = (url, filename) => {\n        if (!url) return;\n        \n        const file = fs.createWriteStream(filename);\n        https.get(url, (response) => {\n          response.pipe(file);\n          file.on('finish', () => {\n            file.close();\n            console.log(`å·²ä¿å­˜: ${filename}`);\n          });\n        }).on('error', (err) => {\n          console.error(`ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥ ${filename}:`, err.message);\n        });\n      };\n      \n      // ä¸‹è½½æ‰€æœ‰å¯ç”¨çš„éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶\n      Object.keys(vocalInfo).forEach(key => {\n        if (vocalInfo[key] && key.endsWith('_url')) {\n          const filename = `${data.task_id}_${key.replace('_url', '')}.mp3`;\n          downloadFile(vocalInfo[key], filename);\n        }\n      });\n    }\n    \n  } else {\n    // ä»»åŠ¡å¤±è´¥\n    console.log('äººå£°åˆ†ç¦»å¤±è´¥:', msg);\n    \n    // å¤„ç†å¤±è´¥æƒ…å†µ...\n    if (code === 400) {\n      console.log('å‚æ•°é”™è¯¯æˆ–éŸ³é¢‘æ ¼å¼ä¸æ”¯æŒ');\n    } else if (code === 451) {\n      console.log('æºéŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥');\n    } else if (code === 500) {\n      console.log('æœåŠ¡å™¨å†…éƒ¨é”™è¯¯');\n    }\n  }\n  \n  // è¿”å›ž200çŠ¶æ€ç ç¡®è®¤æ”¶åˆ°å›žè°ƒ\n  res.status(200).json({ status: 'received' });\n});\n\napp.listen(3000, () => {\n  console.log('å›žè°ƒæœåŠ¡å™¨è¿è¡Œåœ¨ç«¯å£ 3000');\n});\n```\n\n```\nfrom flask import Flask, request, jsonify\nimport requests\n\napp = Flask(__name__)\n\n@app.route('/vocal-separation-callback', methods=['POST'])\ndef handle_callback():\n    data = request.json\n    \n    code = data.get('code')\n    msg = data.get('msg')\n    callback_data = data.get('data', {})\n    task_id = callback_data.get('task_id')\n    vocal_info = callback_data.get('vocal_removal_info')\n    \n    print(f\"æ”¶åˆ°äººå£°åˆ†ç¦»å›žè°ƒ: {task_id}, çŠ¶æ€: {code}, æ¶ˆæ¯: {msg}\")\n    \n    if code == 200:\n        # ä»»åŠ¡æˆåŠŸå®Œæˆ\n        print(\"äººå£°åˆ†ç¦»å®Œæˆ\")\n        \n        if vocal_info:\n            print(\"åˆ†ç¦»ç»“æžœ:\")\n            print(f\"  åŽŸå§‹éŸ³é¢‘: {vocal_info.get('origin_url')}\")\n            \n            # æ ¹æ®ä¸åŒçš„åˆ†ç¦»ç±»åž‹å¤„ç†ä¸åŒçš„æ–‡ä»¶\n            if vocal_info.get('instrumental_url'):\n                # separate_vocal ç±»åž‹\n                print(f\"  çº¯ä¼´å¥: {vocal_info.get('instrumental_url')}\")\n                print(f\"  çº¯äººå£°: {vocal_info.get('vocal_url')}\")\n            else:\n                # split_stem ç±»åž‹\n                print(f\"  äººå£°: {vocal_info.get('vocal_url')}\")\n                print(f\"  å’Œå£°: {vocal_info.get('backing_vocals_url')}\")\n                print(f\"  é¼“å£°: {vocal_info.get('drums_url')}\")\n                print(f\"  è´æ–¯: {vocal_info.get('bass_url')}\")\n                print(f\"  å‰ä»–: {vocal_info.get('guitar_url')}\")\n                print(f\"  é”®ç›˜: {vocal_info.get('keyboard_url')}\")\n                print(f\"  æ‰“å‡»ä¹: {vocal_info.get('percussion_url')}\")\n                print(f\"  å¼¦ä¹: {vocal_info.get('strings_url')}\")\n                print(f\"  åˆæˆå™¨: {vocal_info.get('synth_url')}\")\n                print(f\"  éŸ³æ•ˆ: {vocal_info.get('fx_url')}\")\n                print(f\"  é“œç®¡ä¹: {vocal_info.get('brass_url')}\")\n                print(f\"  æœ¨ç®¡ä¹: {vocal_info.get('woodwinds_url')}\")\n            \n            # ä¸‹è½½åˆ†ç¦»åŽçš„éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶\n            def download_file(url, filename):\n                if not url:\n                    return\n                    \n                try:\n                    response = requests.get(url)\n                    if response.status_code == 200:\n                        with open(filename, \"wb\") as f:\n                            f.write(response.content)\n                        print(f\"å·²ä¿å­˜: {filename}\")\n                except Exception as e:\n                    print(f\"ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥ {filename}: {e}\")\n            \n            # ä¸‹è½½æ‰€æœ‰å¯ç”¨çš„éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶\n            for key, url in vocal_info.items():\n                if url and key.endswith('_url'):\n                    filename = f\"{task_id}_{key.replace('_url', '')}.mp3\"\n                    download_file(url, filename)\n                \n    else:\n        # ä»»åŠ¡å¤±è´¥\n        print(f\"äººå£°åˆ†ç¦»å¤±è´¥: {msg}\")\n        \n        # å¤„ç†å¤±è´¥æƒ…å†µ...\n        if code == 400:\n            print(\"å‚æ•°é”™è¯¯æˆ–éŸ³é¢‘æ ¼å¼ä¸æ”¯æŒ\")\n        elif code == 451:\n            print(\"æºéŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥\")\n        elif code == 500:\n            print(\"æœåŠ¡å™¨å†…éƒ¨é”™è¯¯\")\n    \n    # è¿”å›ž200çŠ¶æ€ç ç¡®è®¤æ”¶åˆ°å›žè°ƒ\n    return jsonify({'status': 'received'}), 200\n\nif __name__ == '__main__':\n    app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=3000)\n```\n\n```\n<?php\nheader('Content-Type: application/json');\n\n// èŽ·å–POSTæ•°æ®\n$input = file_get_contents('php://input');\n$data = json_decode($input, true);\n\n$code = $data['code'] ?? null;\n$msg = $data['msg'] ?? '';\n$callbackData = $data['data'] ?? [];\n$taskId = $callbackData['task_id'] ?? '';\n$vocalInfo = $callbackData['vocal_removal_info'] ?? null;\n\nerror_log(\"æ”¶åˆ°äººå£°åˆ†ç¦»å›žè°ƒ: $taskId, çŠ¶æ€: $code, æ¶ˆæ¯: $msg\");\n\nif ($code === 200) {\n    // ä»»åŠ¡æˆåŠŸå®Œæˆ\n    error_log(\"äººå£°åˆ†ç¦»å®Œæˆ\");\n    \n    if ($vocalInfo) {\n        error_log(\"åˆ†ç¦»ç»“æžœ:\");\n        error_log(\"  åŽŸå§‹éŸ³é¢‘: \" . ($vocalInfo['origin_url'] ?? ''));\n        \n        // æ ¹æ®ä¸åŒçš„åˆ†ç¦»ç±»åž‹å¤„ç†ä¸åŒçš„æ–‡ä»¶\n        if (isset($vocalInfo['instrumental_url'])) {\n            // separate_vocal ç±»åž‹\n            error_log(\"  çº¯ä¼´å¥: \" . ($vocalInfo['instrumental_url'] ?? ''));\n            error_log(\"  çº¯äººå£°: \" . ($vocalInfo['vocal_url'] ?? ''));\n        } else {\n            // split_stem ç±»åž‹\n            error_log(\"  äººå£°: \" . ($vocalInfo['vocal_url'] ?? ''));\n            error_log(\"  å’Œå£°: \" . ($vocalInfo['backing_vocals_url'] ?? ''));\n            error_log(\"  é¼“å£°: \" . ($vocalInfo['drums_url'] ?? ''));\n            error_log(\"  è´æ–¯: \" . ($vocalInfo['bass_url'] ?? ''));\n            error_log(\"  å‰ä»–: \" . ($vocalInfo['guitar_url'] ?? ''));\n            error_log(\"  é”®ç›˜: \" . ($vocalInfo['keyboard_url'] ?? ''));\n            error_log(\"  æ‰“å‡»ä¹: \" . ($vocalInfo['percussion_url'] ?? ''));\n            error_log(\"  å¼¦ä¹: \" . ($vocalInfo['strings_url'] ?? ''));\n            error_log(\"  åˆæˆå™¨: \" . ($vocalInfo['synth_url'] ?? ''));\n            error_log(\"  éŸ³æ•ˆ: \" . ($vocalInfo['fx_url'] ?? ''));\n            error_log(\"  é“œç®¡ä¹: \" . ($vocalInfo['brass_url'] ?? ''));\n            error_log(\"  æœ¨ç®¡ä¹: \" . ($vocalInfo['woodwinds_url'] ?? ''));\n        }\n        \n        // ä¸‹è½½åˆ†ç¦»åŽçš„éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶\n        function downloadFile($url, $filename) {\n            if (!$url) return;\n            \n            try {\n                $content = file_get_contents($url);\n                if ($content !== false) {\n                    file_put_contents($filename, $content);\n                    error_log(\"å·²ä¿å­˜: $filename\");\n                }\n            } catch (Exception $e) {\n                error_log(\"ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥ $filename: \" . $e->getMessage());\n            }\n        }\n        \n        // ä¸‹è½½æ‰€æœ‰å¯ç”¨çš„éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶\n        foreach ($vocalInfo as $key => $url) {\n            if ($url && strpos($key, '_url') !== false) {\n                $filename = $taskId . '_' . str_replace('_url', '', $key) . '.mp3';\n                downloadFile($url, $filename);\n            }\n        }\n    }\n    \n} else {\n    // ä»»åŠ¡å¤±è´¥\n    error_log(\"äººå£°åˆ†ç¦»å¤±è´¥: $msg\");\n    \n    // å¤„ç†å¤±è´¥æƒ…å†µ...\n    if ($code === 400) {\n        error_log(\"å‚æ•°é”™è¯¯æˆ–éŸ³é¢‘æ ¼å¼ä¸æ”¯æŒ\");\n    } elseif ($code === 451) {\n        error_log(\"æºéŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥\");\n    } elseif ($code === 500) {\n        error_log(\"æœåŠ¡å™¨å†…éƒ¨é”™è¯¯\");\n    }\n}\n\n// è¿”å›ž200çŠ¶æ€ç ç¡®è®¤æ”¶åˆ°å›žè°ƒ\nhttp_response_code(200);\necho json_encode(['status' => 'received']);\n?>\n```\n\n## æœ€ä½³å®žè·µ\n\n## æ•…éšœæŽ’æŸ¥\n\nå¦‚æžœæ‚¨æ²¡æœ‰æ”¶åˆ°å›žè°ƒé€šçŸ¥ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥ä»¥ä¸‹å†…å®¹ï¼š\n\n## æ›¿ä»£æ–¹æ¡ˆ\n\nå¦‚æžœæ‚¨æ— æ³•ä½¿ç”¨å›žè°ƒæœºåˆ¶ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨è½®è¯¢æ–¹å¼ï¼š\n\n[\n\n## è½®è¯¢æŸ¥è¯¢ç»“æžœ\n\nä½¿ç”¨èŽ·å–äººå£°åˆ†ç¦»è¯¦æƒ…æŽ¥å£å®šæ—¶æŸ¥è¯¢ä»»åŠ¡çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œå»ºè®®æ¯30ç§’æŸ¥è¯¢ä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚\n\n\n\n](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/get-vocal-separation-details)\n\n---\n\n## Source: https://docs.sunoapi.org/cn/suno-api/upload-and-cover-audio-callbacks\n\n# ä¸Šä¼ å¹¶ç¿»å”±éŸ³é¢‘å›žè°ƒ - Suno API\n\nå½“æ‚¨å‘ä¸Šä¼ å¹¶ç¿»å”±éŸ³é¢‘APIæäº¤ä»»åŠ¡æ—¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ `callBackUrl` å‚æ•°è®¾ç½®å›žè°ƒURLã€‚å½“ä»»åŠ¡å®Œæˆæ—¶ï¼Œç³»ç»Ÿä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨å°†ç»“æžœæŽ¨é€åˆ°æ‚¨æŒ‡å®šçš„åœ°å€ã€‚\n\n## å›žè°ƒæœºåˆ¶æ¦‚è¿°\n\n### å›žè°ƒæ—¶æœº\n\nç³»ç»Ÿä¼šåœ¨ä»¥ä¸‹æƒ…å†µå‘é€å›žè°ƒé€šçŸ¥ï¼š\n\n*   éŸ³é¢‘ç¿»å”±ä»»åŠ¡æˆåŠŸå®Œæˆ\n*   éŸ³é¢‘ç¿»å”±ä»»åŠ¡å¤±è´¥\n*   ä»»åŠ¡å¤„ç†è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯\n\n### å›žè°ƒæ–¹å¼\n\n*   **HTTPæ–¹æ³•**: POST\n*   **Content Type**: application/json\n*   **è¶…æ—¶è®¾ç½®**: 15ç§’\n\n## å›žè°ƒè¯·æ±‚æ ¼å¼\n\nä»»åŠ¡å®Œæˆæ—¶ï¼Œç³»ç»Ÿä¼šå‘æ‚¨çš„ `callBackUrl` å‘é€ä»¥ä¸‹æ ¼å¼çš„POSTè¯·æ±‚ï¼š\n\n## çŠ¶æ€ç è¯´æ˜Ž\n\ncode\n\ninteger\n\nå¿…å¡«\n\nå›žè°ƒçŠ¶æ€ç ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºä»»åŠ¡å¤„ç†ç»“æžœï¼š\n\nçŠ¶æ€ç \n\nè¯´æ˜Ž\n\n200\n\næˆåŠŸ - éŸ³é¢‘ç¿»å”±å®Œæˆ\n\n400\n\nè¯·æ±‚é”™è¯¯ - å‚æ•°é”™è¯¯ã€éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶æ ¼å¼ä¸æ”¯æŒã€å†…å®¹è¿è§„ç­‰\n\n451\n\nä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥ - æ— æ³•ä¸‹è½½æºéŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶\n\n500\n\næœåŠ¡å™¨é”™è¯¯ - è¯·ç¨åŽé‡è¯•\n\nmsg\n\nstring\n\nå¿…å¡«\n\nçŠ¶æ€æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œæä¾›è¯¦ç»†çš„çŠ¶æ€æè¿°\n\ndata.callbackType\n\nstring\n\nå¿…å¡«\n\nå›žè°ƒç±»åž‹ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºå½“å‰å›žè°ƒçš„é˜¶æ®µï¼š\n\n*   `text`: æ–‡æœ¬ç”Ÿæˆå®Œæˆ\n*   `first`: ç¬¬ä¸€é¦–éŸ³ä¹å®Œæˆ\n*   `complete`: æ‰€æœ‰éŸ³ä¹å®Œæˆ\n*   `error`: ä»»åŠ¡å¤±è´¥\n\ndata.task\\_id\n\nstring\n\nå¿…å¡«\n\nä»»åŠ¡IDï¼Œä¸Žæ‚¨æäº¤ä»»åŠ¡æ—¶è¿”å›žçš„taskIdä¸€è‡´\n\ndata.data\n\narray\n\néŸ³é¢‘ç¿»å”±ç»“æžœä¿¡æ¯ï¼ŒæˆåŠŸæ—¶è¿”å›ž\n\ndata.data\\[\\].id\n\nstring\n\néŸ³ä¹å”¯ä¸€æ ‡è¯†ç¬¦\n\ndata.data\\[\\].audio\\_url\n\nstring\n\nç¿»å”±åŽçš„éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].source\\_audio\\_url\n\nstring\n\nåŽŸå§‹éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].stream\\_audio\\_url\n\nstring\n\næµå¼éŸ³é¢‘URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].source\\_stream\\_audio\\_url\n\nstring\n\nåŽŸå§‹æµå¼éŸ³é¢‘URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].image\\_url\n\nstring\n\nå°é¢å›¾ç‰‡URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].source\\_image\\_url\n\nstring\n\nåŽŸå§‹å°é¢å›¾ç‰‡URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].prompt\n\nstring\n\nç”Ÿæˆæç¤ºè¯/æ­Œè¯\n\ndata.data\\[\\].model\\_name\n\nstring\n\nä½¿ç”¨çš„æ¨¡åž‹åç§°\n\ndata.data\\[\\].title\n\nstring\n\néŸ³ä¹æ ‡é¢˜\n\ndata.data\\[\\].tags\n\nstring\n\néŸ³ä¹æ ‡ç­¾\n\ndata.data\\[\\].createTime\n\nstring\n\nåˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´\n\ndata.data\\[\\].duration\n\nnumber\n\néŸ³é¢‘æ—¶é•¿ï¼ˆç§’ï¼‰\n\n## å›žè°ƒæŽ¥æ”¶ç¤ºä¾‹\n\nä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯ä¸»æµç¼–ç¨‹è¯­è¨€æŽ¥æ”¶å›žè°ƒçš„ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç ï¼š\n\n*   Node.js\n    \n*   Python\n    \n*   PHP\n    \n\n```\nconst express = require('express');\nconst app = express();\n\napp.use(express.json());\n\napp.post('/upload-cover-callback', (req, res) => {\n  const { code, msg, data } = req.body;\n  \n  console.log('æ”¶åˆ°éŸ³é¢‘ç¿»å”±å›žè°ƒ:', {\n    taskId: data.task_id,\n    callbackType: data.callbackType,\n    status: code,\n    message: msg\n  });\n  \n  if (code === 200) {\n    // ä»»åŠ¡æˆåŠŸå®Œæˆ\n    console.log('éŸ³é¢‘ç¿»å”±å®Œæˆ');\n    const musicData = data.data || [];\n    \n    console.log(`ç¿»å”±äº† ${musicData.length} é¦–éŸ³ä¹:`);\n    musicData.forEach((music, index) => {\n      console.log(`ç¿»å”±éŸ³ä¹ ${index + 1}:`);\n      console.log(`  æ ‡é¢˜: ${music.title}`);\n      console.log(`  æ—¶é•¿: ${music.duration}ç§’`);\n      console.log(`  é£Žæ ¼æ ‡ç­¾: ${music.tags}`);\n      console.log(`  ç¿»å”±éŸ³é¢‘URL: ${music.audio_url}`);\n      console.log(`  å°é¢URL: ${music.image_url}`);\n    });\n    \n    // å¤„ç†ç¿»å”±çš„éŸ³ä¹\n    // å¯ä»¥ä¸‹è½½éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶ã€ä¿å­˜åˆ°æœ¬åœ°ç­‰\n    \n  } else {\n    // ä»»åŠ¡å¤±è´¥\n    console.log('éŸ³é¢‘ç¿»å”±å¤±è´¥:', msg);\n    \n    // å¤„ç†å¤±è´¥æƒ…å†µ...\n    if (code === 400) {\n      console.log('å‚æ•°é”™è¯¯æˆ–å†…å®¹è¿è§„');\n    } else if (code === 451) {\n      console.log('æºéŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥');\n    } else if (code === 500) {\n      console.log('æœåŠ¡å™¨å†…éƒ¨é”™è¯¯');\n    }\n  }\n  \n  // è¿”å›ž200çŠ¶æ€ç ç¡®è®¤æ”¶åˆ°å›žè°ƒ\n  res.status(200).json({ status: 'received' });\n});\n\napp.listen(3000, () => {\n  console.log('å›žè°ƒæœåŠ¡å™¨è¿è¡Œåœ¨ç«¯å£ 3000');\n});\n```\n\n```\nfrom flask import Flask, request, jsonify\nimport requests\n\napp = Flask(__name__)\n\n@app.route('/upload-cover-callback', methods=['POST'])\ndef handle_callback():\n    data = request.json\n    \n    code = data.get('code')\n    msg = data.get('msg')\n    callback_data = data.get('data', {})\n    task_id = callback_data.get('task_id')\n    callback_type = callback_data.get('callbackType')\n    music_data = callback_data.get('data', [])\n    \n    print(f\"æ”¶åˆ°éŸ³é¢‘ç¿»å”±å›žè°ƒ: {task_id}, ç±»åž‹: {callback_type}, çŠ¶æ€: {code}, æ¶ˆæ¯: {msg}\")\n    \n    if code == 200:\n        # ä»»åŠ¡æˆåŠŸå®Œæˆ\n        print(\"éŸ³é¢‘ç¿»å”±å®Œæˆ\")\n        \n        print(f\"ç¿»å”±äº† {len(music_data)} é¦–éŸ³ä¹:\")\n        for i, music in enumerate(music_data):\n            print(f\"ç¿»å”±éŸ³ä¹ {i + 1}:\")\n            print(f\"  æ ‡é¢˜: {music.get('title')}\")\n            print(f\"  æ—¶é•¿: {music.get('duration')}ç§’\")\n            print(f\"  é£Žæ ¼æ ‡ç­¾: {music.get('tags')}\")\n            print(f\"  ç¿»å”±éŸ³é¢‘URL: {music.get('audio_url')}\")\n            print(f\"  å°é¢URL: {music.get('image_url')}\")\n            \n            # ä¸‹è½½ç¿»å”±éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶ç¤ºä¾‹\n            try:\n                audio_url = music.get('audio_url')\n                if audio_url:\n                    response = requests.get(audio_url)\n                    if response.status_code == 200:\n                        filename = f\"covered_music_{task_id}_{i + 1}.mp3\"\n                        with open(filename, \"wb\") as f:\n                            f.write(response.content)\n                        print(f\"ç¿»å”±éŸ³é¢‘å·²ä¿å­˜ä¸º {filename}\")\n            except Exception as e:\n                print(f\"éŸ³é¢‘ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥: {e}\")\n                \n    else:\n        # ä»»åŠ¡å¤±è´¥\n        print(f\"éŸ³é¢‘ç¿»å”±å¤±è´¥: {msg}\")\n        \n        # å¤„ç†å¤±è´¥æƒ…å†µ...\n        if code == 400:\n            print(\"å‚æ•°é”™è¯¯æˆ–å†…å®¹è¿è§„\")\n        elif code == 451:\n            print(\"æºéŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥\")\n        elif code == 500:\n            print(\"æœåŠ¡å™¨å†…éƒ¨é”™è¯¯\")\n    \n    # è¿”å›ž200çŠ¶æ€ç ç¡®è®¤æ”¶åˆ°å›žè°ƒ\n    return jsonify({'status': 'received'}), 200\n\nif __name__ == '__main__':\n    app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=3000)\n```\n\n```\n<?php\nheader('Content-Type: application/json');\n\n// èŽ·å–POSTæ•°æ®\n$input = file_get_contents('php://input');\n$data = json_decode($input, true);\n\n$code = $data['code'] ?? null;\n$msg = $data['msg'] ?? '';\n$callbackData = $data['data'] ?? [];\n$taskId = $callbackData['task_id'] ?? '';\n$callbackType = $callbackData['callbackType'] ?? '';\n$musicData = $callbackData['data'] ?? [];\n\nerror_log(\"æ”¶åˆ°éŸ³é¢‘ç¿»å”±å›žè°ƒ: $taskId, ç±»åž‹: $callbackType, çŠ¶æ€: $code, æ¶ˆæ¯: $msg\");\n\nif ($code === 200) {\n    // ä»»åŠ¡æˆåŠŸå®Œæˆ\n    error_log(\"éŸ³é¢‘ç¿»å”±å®Œæˆ\");\n    \n    error_log(\"ç¿»å”±äº† \" . count($musicData) . \" é¦–éŸ³ä¹:\");\n    foreach ($musicData as $index => $music) {\n        error_log(\"ç¿»å”±éŸ³ä¹ \" . ($index + 1) . \":\");\n        error_log(\"  æ ‡é¢˜: \" . ($music['title'] ?? ''));\n        error_log(\"  æ—¶é•¿: \" . ($music['duration'] ?? 0) . \"ç§’\");\n        error_log(\"  é£Žæ ¼æ ‡ç­¾: \" . ($music['tags'] ?? ''));\n        error_log(\"  ç¿»å”±éŸ³é¢‘URL: \" . ($music['audio_url'] ?? ''));\n        error_log(\"  å°é¢URL: \" . ($music['image_url'] ?? ''));\n        \n        // ä¸‹è½½ç¿»å”±éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶ç¤ºä¾‹\n        try {\n            $audioUrl = $music['audio_url'] ?? '';\n            if ($audioUrl) {\n                $audioContent = file_get_contents($audioUrl);\n                if ($audioContent !== false) {\n                    $filename = \"covered_music_{$taskId}_\" . ($index + 1) . \".mp3\";\n                    file_put_contents($filename, $audioContent);\n                    error_log(\"ç¿»å”±éŸ³é¢‘å·²ä¿å­˜ä¸º $filename\");\n                }\n            }\n        } catch (Exception $e) {\n            error_log(\"éŸ³é¢‘ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥: \" . $e->getMessage());\n        }\n    }\n    \n} else {\n    // ä»»åŠ¡å¤±è´¥\n    error_log(\"éŸ³é¢‘ç¿»å”±å¤±è´¥: $msg\");\n    \n    // å¤„ç†å¤±è´¥æƒ…å†µ...\n    if ($code === 400) {\n        error_log(\"å‚æ•°é”™è¯¯æˆ–å†…å®¹è¿è§„\");\n    } elseif ($code === 451) {\n        error_log(\"æºéŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥\");\n    } elseif ($code === 500) {\n        error_log(\"æœåŠ¡å™¨å†…éƒ¨é”™è¯¯\");\n    }\n}\n\n// è¿”å›ž200çŠ¶æ€ç ç¡®è®¤æ”¶åˆ°å›žè°ƒ\nhttp_response_code(200);\necho json_encode(['status' => 'received']);\n?>\n```\n\n## æœ€ä½³å®žè·µ\n\n## æ•…éšœæŽ’æŸ¥\n\nå¦‚æžœæ‚¨æ²¡æœ‰æ”¶åˆ°å›žè°ƒé€šçŸ¥ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥ä»¥ä¸‹å†…å®¹ï¼š\n\n## æ›¿ä»£æ–¹æ¡ˆ\n\nå¦‚æžœæ‚¨æ— æ³•ä½¿ç”¨å›žè°ƒæœºåˆ¶ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨è½®è¯¢æ–¹å¼ï¼š\n\n[\n\n## è½®è¯¢æŸ¥è¯¢ç»“æžœ\n\nä½¿ç”¨èŽ·å–éŸ³ä¹ç”Ÿæˆè¯¦æƒ…æŽ¥å£å®šæ—¶æŸ¥è¯¢ä»»åŠ¡çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œå»ºè®®æ¯30ç§’æŸ¥è¯¢ä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚\n\n\n\n](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/get-music-generation-details)\n\n---\n\n## Source: https://docs.sunoapi.org/file-upload-api/upload-file-base-64\n\n# Base64 File Upload - Suno API\n\n```\n{  \"success\": true,  \"code\": 200,  \"msg\": \"File uploaded successfully\",  \"data\": {    \"fileName\": \"uploaded-image.png\",    \"filePath\": \"images/user-uploads/uploaded-image.png\",    \"downloadUrl\": \"https://tempfile.redpandaai.co/xxx/images/user-uploads/uploaded-image.png\",    \"fileSize\": 154832,    \"mimeType\": \"image/png\",    \"uploadedAt\": \"2025-01-01T12:00:00.000Z\"  }}\n```\n\n### Features\n\n*   Supports Base64 encoded data and data URL format\n*   Automatic MIME type recognition and file extension inference\n*   Support for custom file names or auto-generation\n*   Returns complete file information and download links\n*   API Key authentication protection\n*   Uploaded files are temporary and automatically deleted after 3 days\n\n### Supported Formats\n\n*   **Pure Base64 String**: `iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAA...`\n*   **Data URL Format**: `data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAA...`\n\n### Usage Recommendations\n\n*   Recommended for small files like images\n*   For large files (>10MB), use the file stream upload API\n*   Base64 encoding increases data transmission by approximately 33%\n\nAll APIs require authentication via Bearer Token.\n\nGet API Key:\n\n1.  Visit [API Key Management Page](https://sunoapi.org/api-key) to get your API Key\n\nUsage: Add to request header: Authorization: Bearer YOUR\\_API\\_KEY\n\nNote:\n\n*   Keep your API Key secure and do not share it with others\n*   If you suspect your API Key has been compromised, reset it immediately in the management page\n\n#### Body\n\napplication/json\n\nbase64Data\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nBase64 encoded file data. Supports pure Base64 strings or data URL format\n\nExample:\n\n`\"data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAA...\"`\n\nuploadPath\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nFile upload path, without leading or trailing slashes\n\nExample:\n\n`\"images/base64\"`\n\nfileName\n\nstring\n\nFile name (optional), including file extension. If not provided, a random filename will be generated. If the same filename already exists, the old file will be overwritten, but changes may not be immediately visible due to caching\n\nExample:\n\n`\"my-image.png\"`\n\nFile uploaded successfully\n\nsuccess\n\nboolean\n\nrequired\n\nWhether the request was successful\n\ncode\n\nenum<integer>\n\nrequired\n\nResponse status code\n\nAvailable options\n\n:\n\n`200`,\n\n`400`,\n\n`401`,\n\n`405`,\n\n`500`\n\nmsg\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nResponse message\n\nExample:\n\n`\"File uploaded successfully\"`\n\ndata\n\nobject\n\nShow child attributes\n\n---\n\n## Source: https://docs.sunoapi.org/file-upload-api/upload-file-stream\n\n# File Stream Upload - Suno API\n\nFile Stream Upload\n\n```\n{  \"success\": true,  \"code\": 200,  \"msg\": \"File uploaded successfully\",  \"data\": {    \"fileName\": \"uploaded-image.png\",    \"filePath\": \"images/user-uploads/uploaded-image.png\",    \"downloadUrl\": \"https://tempfile.redpandaai.co/xxx/images/user-uploads/uploaded-image.png\",    \"fileSize\": 154832,    \"mimeType\": \"image/png\",    \"uploadedAt\": \"2025-01-01T12:00:00.000Z\"  }}\n```\n\n### Features\n\n*   Supports binary stream upload for various file types\n*   Suitable for large file uploads with high transmission efficiency\n*   Automatic MIME type recognition\n*   Support for custom file names or using original file names\n*   Returns complete file information and download links\n*   API Key authentication protection\n*   Uploaded files are temporary and automatically deleted after 3 days\n\n### Usage Recommendations\n\n*   Recommended for large files (>10MB)\n*   Supports various formats: images, videos, documents, etc.\n*   Transmission efficiency is approximately 33% higher than Base64 format\n\n### Example Command\n\n```\ncurl -X POST https://sunoapiorg.redpandaai.co/api/file-stream-upload \\\n  -H \"Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY\" \\\n  -F \"file=@/path/to/your-file.jpg\" \\\n  -F \"uploadPath=images/user-uploads\" \\\n  -F \"fileName=custom-name.jpg\"\n```\n\nAll APIs require authentication via Bearer Token.\n\nGet API Key:\n\n1.  Visit [API Key Management Page](https://sunoapi.org/api-key) to get your API Key\n\nUsage: Add to request header: Authorization: Bearer YOUR\\_API\\_KEY\n\nNote:\n\n*   Keep your API Key secure and do not share it with others\n*   If you suspect your API Key has been compromised, reset it immediately in the management page\n\n#### Body\n\nmultipart/form-data\n\nfile\n\nfile\n\nrequired\n\nFile to upload (binary data)\n\nuploadPath\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nFile upload path, without leading or trailing slashes\n\nExample:\n\n`\"images/user-uploads\"`\n\nfileName\n\nstring\n\nFile name (optional), including file extension. If not provided, the original filename will be used. If the same filename already exists, the old file will be overwritten, but changes may not be immediately visible due to caching\n\nExample:\n\n`\"my-image.jpg\"`\n\nFile uploaded successfully\n\nsuccess\n\nboolean\n\nrequired\n\nWhether the request was successful\n\ncode\n\nenum<integer>\n\nrequired\n\nResponse status code\n\nAvailable options\n\n:\n\n`200`,\n\n`400`,\n\n`401`,\n\n`405`,\n\n`500`\n\nmsg\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nResponse message\n\nExample:\n\n`\"File uploaded successfully\"`\n\ndata\n\nobject\n\nShow child attributes\n\n---\n\n## Source: https://docs.sunoapi.org/cn/suno-api/upload-and-extend-audio-callbacks\n\n# ä¸Šä¼ å¹¶æ‰©å±•éŸ³é¢‘å›žè°ƒ - Suno API\n\nå½“æ‚¨å‘ä¸Šä¼ å¹¶æ‰©å±•éŸ³é¢‘APIæäº¤ä»»åŠ¡æ—¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ `callBackUrl` å‚æ•°è®¾ç½®å›žè°ƒURLã€‚å½“ä»»åŠ¡å®Œæˆæ—¶ï¼Œç³»ç»Ÿä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨å°†ç»“æžœæŽ¨é€åˆ°æ‚¨æŒ‡å®šçš„åœ°å€ã€‚\n\n## å›žè°ƒæœºåˆ¶æ¦‚è¿°\n\n### å›žè°ƒæ—¶æœº\n\nç³»ç»Ÿä¼šåœ¨ä»¥ä¸‹æƒ…å†µå‘é€å›žè°ƒé€šçŸ¥ï¼š\n\n*   éŸ³é¢‘æ‰©å±•ä»»åŠ¡æˆåŠŸå®Œæˆ\n*   éŸ³é¢‘æ‰©å±•ä»»åŠ¡å¤±è´¥\n*   ä»»åŠ¡å¤„ç†è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯\n\n### å›žè°ƒæ–¹å¼\n\n*   **HTTPæ–¹æ³•**: POST\n*   **Content Type**: application/json\n*   **è¶…æ—¶è®¾ç½®**: 15ç§’\n\n## å›žè°ƒè¯·æ±‚æ ¼å¼\n\nä»»åŠ¡å®Œæˆæ—¶ï¼Œç³»ç»Ÿä¼šå‘æ‚¨çš„ `callBackUrl` å‘é€ä»¥ä¸‹æ ¼å¼çš„POSTè¯·æ±‚ï¼š\n\n## çŠ¶æ€ç è¯´æ˜Ž\n\ncode\n\ninteger\n\nå¿…å¡«\n\nå›žè°ƒçŠ¶æ€ç ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºä»»åŠ¡å¤„ç†ç»“æžœï¼š\n\nçŠ¶æ€ç \n\nè¯´æ˜Ž\n\n200\n\næˆåŠŸ - éŸ³é¢‘æ‰©å±•å®Œæˆ\n\n400\n\nè¯·æ±‚é”™è¯¯ - å‚æ•°é”™è¯¯ã€éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶æ ¼å¼ä¸æ”¯æŒã€å†…å®¹è¿è§„ç­‰\n\n451\n\nä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥ - æ— æ³•ä¸‹è½½æºéŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶\n\n500\n\næœåŠ¡å™¨é”™è¯¯ - è¯·ç¨åŽé‡è¯•\n\nmsg\n\nstring\n\nå¿…å¡«\n\nçŠ¶æ€æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œæä¾›è¯¦ç»†çš„çŠ¶æ€æè¿°\n\ndata.callbackType\n\nstring\n\nå¿…å¡«\n\nå›žè°ƒç±»åž‹ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºå½“å‰å›žè°ƒçš„é˜¶æ®µï¼š\n\n*   `text`: æ–‡æœ¬ç”Ÿæˆå®Œæˆ\n*   `first`: ç¬¬ä¸€é¦–éŸ³ä¹å®Œæˆ\n*   `complete`: æ‰€æœ‰éŸ³ä¹å®Œæˆ\n*   `error`: ä»»åŠ¡å¤±è´¥\n\ndata.task\\_id\n\nstring\n\nå¿…å¡«\n\nä»»åŠ¡IDï¼Œä¸Žæ‚¨æäº¤ä»»åŠ¡æ—¶è¿”å›žçš„taskIdä¸€è‡´\n\ndata.data\n\narray\n\néŸ³é¢‘æ‰©å±•ç»“æžœä¿¡æ¯ï¼ŒæˆåŠŸæ—¶è¿”å›ž\n\ndata.data\\[\\].id\n\nstring\n\néŸ³ä¹å”¯ä¸€æ ‡è¯†ç¬¦\n\ndata.data\\[\\].audio\\_url\n\nstring\n\næ‰©å±•åŽçš„éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].source\\_audio\\_url\n\nstring\n\nåŽŸå§‹éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].stream\\_audio\\_url\n\nstring\n\næµå¼éŸ³é¢‘URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].source\\_stream\\_audio\\_url\n\nstring\n\nåŽŸå§‹æµå¼éŸ³é¢‘URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].image\\_url\n\nstring\n\nå°é¢å›¾ç‰‡URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].source\\_image\\_url\n\nstring\n\nåŽŸå§‹å°é¢å›¾ç‰‡URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].prompt\n\nstring\n\nç”Ÿæˆæç¤ºè¯/æ­Œè¯\n\ndata.data\\[\\].model\\_name\n\nstring\n\nä½¿ç”¨çš„æ¨¡åž‹åç§°\n\ndata.data\\[\\].title\n\nstring\n\néŸ³ä¹æ ‡é¢˜\n\ndata.data\\[\\].tags\n\nstring\n\néŸ³ä¹æ ‡ç­¾\n\ndata.data\\[\\].createTime\n\nstring\n\nåˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´\n\ndata.data\\[\\].duration\n\nnumber\n\néŸ³é¢‘æ—¶é•¿ï¼ˆç§’ï¼‰\n\n## å›žè°ƒæŽ¥æ”¶ç¤ºä¾‹\n\nä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯ä¸»æµç¼–ç¨‹è¯­è¨€æŽ¥æ”¶å›žè°ƒçš„ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç ï¼š\n\n*   Node.js\n    \n*   Python\n    \n*   PHP\n    \n\n```\nconst express = require('express');\nconst app = express();\n\napp.use(express.json());\n\napp.post('/upload-extend-callback', (req, res) => {\n  const { code, msg, data } = req.body;\n  \n  console.log('æ”¶åˆ°éŸ³é¢‘æ‰©å±•å›žè°ƒ:', {\n    taskId: data.task_id,\n    callbackType: data.callbackType,\n    status: code,\n    message: msg\n  });\n  \n  if (code === 200) {\n    // ä»»åŠ¡æˆåŠŸå®Œæˆ\n    console.log('éŸ³é¢‘æ‰©å±•å®Œæˆ');\n    const musicData = data.data || [];\n    \n    console.log(`æ‰©å±•äº† ${musicData.length} é¦–éŸ³ä¹:`);\n    musicData.forEach((music, index) => {\n      console.log(`æ‰©å±•éŸ³ä¹ ${index + 1}:`);\n      console.log(`  æ ‡é¢˜: ${music.title}`);\n      console.log(`  æ—¶é•¿: ${music.duration}ç§’`);\n      console.log(`  é£Žæ ¼æ ‡ç­¾: ${music.tags}`);\n      console.log(`  æ‰©å±•éŸ³é¢‘URL: ${music.audio_url}`);\n      console.log(`  å°é¢URL: ${music.image_url}`);\n    });\n    \n    // å¤„ç†æ‰©å±•çš„éŸ³ä¹\n    // å¯ä»¥ä¸‹è½½éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶ã€ä¿å­˜åˆ°æœ¬åœ°ç­‰\n    \n  } else {\n    // ä»»åŠ¡å¤±è´¥\n    console.log('éŸ³é¢‘æ‰©å±•å¤±è´¥:', msg);\n    \n    // å¤„ç†å¤±è´¥æƒ…å†µ...\n    if (code === 400) {\n      console.log('å‚æ•°é”™è¯¯æˆ–å†…å®¹è¿è§„');\n    } else if (code === 451) {\n      console.log('æºéŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥');\n    } else if (code === 500) {\n      console.log('æœåŠ¡å™¨å†…éƒ¨é”™è¯¯');\n    }\n  }\n  \n  // è¿”å›ž200çŠ¶æ€ç ç¡®è®¤æ”¶åˆ°å›žè°ƒ\n  res.status(200).json({ status: 'received' });\n});\n\napp.listen(3000, () => {\n  console.log('å›žè°ƒæœåŠ¡å™¨è¿è¡Œåœ¨ç«¯å£ 3000');\n});\n```\n\n```\nfrom flask import Flask, request, jsonify\nimport requests\n\napp = Flask(__name__)\n\n@app.route('/upload-extend-callback', methods=['POST'])\ndef handle_callback():\n    data = request.json\n    \n    code = data.get('code')\n    msg = data.get('msg')\n    callback_data = data.get('data', {})\n    task_id = callback_data.get('task_id')\n    callback_type = callback_data.get('callbackType')\n    music_data = callback_data.get('data', [])\n    \n    print(f\"æ”¶åˆ°éŸ³é¢‘æ‰©å±•å›žè°ƒ: {task_id}, ç±»åž‹: {callback_type}, çŠ¶æ€: {code}, æ¶ˆæ¯: {msg}\")\n    \n    if code == 200:\n        # ä»»åŠ¡æˆåŠŸå®Œæˆ\n        print(\"éŸ³é¢‘æ‰©å±•å®Œæˆ\")\n        \n        print(f\"æ‰©å±•äº† {len(music_data)} é¦–éŸ³ä¹:\")\n        for i, music in enumerate(music_data):\n            print(f\"æ‰©å±•éŸ³ä¹ {i + 1}:\")\n            print(f\"  æ ‡é¢˜: {music.get('title')}\")\n            print(f\"  æ—¶é•¿: {music.get('duration')}ç§’\")\n            print(f\"  é£Žæ ¼æ ‡ç­¾: {music.get('tags')}\")\n            print(f\"  æ‰©å±•éŸ³é¢‘URL: {music.get('audio_url')}\")\n            print(f\"  å°é¢URL: {music.get('image_url')}\")\n            \n            # ä¸‹è½½æ‰©å±•éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶ç¤ºä¾‹\n            try:\n                audio_url = music.get('audio_url')\n                if audio_url:\n                    response = requests.get(audio_url)\n                    if response.status_code == 200:\n                        filename = f\"extended_music_{task_id}_{i + 1}.mp3\"\n                        with open(filename, \"wb\") as f:\n                            f.write(response.content)\n                        print(f\"æ‰©å±•éŸ³é¢‘å·²ä¿å­˜ä¸º {filename}\")\n            except Exception as e:\n                print(f\"éŸ³é¢‘ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥: {e}\")\n                \n    else:\n        # ä»»åŠ¡å¤±è´¥\n        print(f\"éŸ³é¢‘æ‰©å±•å¤±è´¥: {msg}\")\n        \n        # å¤„ç†å¤±è´¥æƒ…å†µ...\n        if code == 400:\n            print(\"å‚æ•°é”™è¯¯æˆ–å†…å®¹è¿è§„\")\n        elif code == 451:\n            print(\"æºéŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥\")\n        elif code == 500:\n            print(\"æœåŠ¡å™¨å†…éƒ¨é”™è¯¯\")\n    \n    # è¿”å›ž200çŠ¶æ€ç ç¡®è®¤æ”¶åˆ°å›žè°ƒ\n    return jsonify({'status': 'received'}), 200\n\nif __name__ == '__main__':\n    app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=3000)\n```\n\n```\n<?php\nheader('Content-Type: application/json');\n\n// èŽ·å–POSTæ•°æ®\n$input = file_get_contents('php://input');\n$data = json_decode($input, true);\n\n$code = $data['code'] ?? null;\n$msg = $data['msg'] ?? '';\n$callbackData = $data['data'] ?? [];\n$taskId = $callbackData['task_id'] ?? '';\n$callbackType = $callbackData['callbackType'] ?? '';\n$musicData = $callbackData['data'] ?? [];\n\nerror_log(\"æ”¶åˆ°éŸ³é¢‘æ‰©å±•å›žè°ƒ: $taskId, ç±»åž‹: $callbackType, çŠ¶æ€: $code, æ¶ˆæ¯: $msg\");\n\nif ($code === 200) {\n    // ä»»åŠ¡æˆåŠŸå®Œæˆ\n    error_log(\"éŸ³é¢‘æ‰©å±•å®Œæˆ\");\n    \n    error_log(\"æ‰©å±•äº† \" . count($musicData) . \" é¦–éŸ³ä¹:\");\n    foreach ($musicData as $index => $music) {\n        error_log(\"æ‰©å±•éŸ³ä¹ \" . ($index + 1) . \":\");\n        error_log(\"  æ ‡é¢˜: \" . ($music['title'] ?? ''));\n        error_log(\"  æ—¶é•¿: \" . ($music['duration'] ?? 0) . \"ç§’\");\n        error_log(\"  é£Žæ ¼æ ‡ç­¾: \" . ($music['tags'] ?? ''));\n        error_log(\"  æ‰©å±•éŸ³é¢‘URL: \" . ($music['audio_url'] ?? ''));\n        error_log(\"  å°é¢URL: \" . ($music['image_url'] ?? ''));\n        \n        // ä¸‹è½½æ‰©å±•éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶ç¤ºä¾‹\n        try {\n            $audioUrl = $music['audio_url'] ?? '';\n            if ($audioUrl) {\n                $audioContent = file_get_contents($audioUrl);\n                if ($audioContent !== false) {\n                    $filename = \"extended_music_{$taskId}_\" . ($index + 1) . \".mp3\";\n                    file_put_contents($filename, $audioContent);\n                    error_log(\"æ‰©å±•éŸ³é¢‘å·²ä¿å­˜ä¸º $filename\");\n                }\n            }\n        } catch (Exception $e) {\n            error_log(\"éŸ³é¢‘ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥: \" . $e->getMessage());\n        }\n    }\n    \n} else {\n    // ä»»åŠ¡å¤±è´¥\n    error_log(\"éŸ³é¢‘æ‰©å±•å¤±è´¥: $msg\");\n    \n    // å¤„ç†å¤±è´¥æƒ…å†µ...\n    if ($code === 400) {\n        error_log(\"å‚æ•°é”™è¯¯æˆ–å†…å®¹è¿è§„\");\n    } elseif ($code === 451) {\n        error_log(\"æºéŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥\");\n    } elseif ($code === 500) {\n        error_log(\"æœåŠ¡å™¨å†…éƒ¨é”™è¯¯\");\n    }\n}\n\n// è¿”å›ž200çŠ¶æ€ç ç¡®è®¤æ”¶åˆ°å›žè°ƒ\nhttp_response_code(200);\necho json_encode(['status' => 'received']);\n?>\n```\n\n## æœ€ä½³å®žè·µ\n\n## æ•…éšœæŽ’æŸ¥\n\nå¦‚æžœæ‚¨æ²¡æœ‰æ”¶åˆ°å›žè°ƒé€šçŸ¥ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥ä»¥ä¸‹å†…å®¹ï¼š\n\n## æ›¿ä»£æ–¹æ¡ˆ\n\nå¦‚æžœæ‚¨æ— æ³•ä½¿ç”¨å›žè°ƒæœºåˆ¶ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨è½®è¯¢æ–¹å¼ï¼š\n\n[\n\n## è½®è¯¢æŸ¥è¯¢ç»“æžœ\n\nä½¿ç”¨èŽ·å–éŸ³ä¹ç”Ÿæˆè¯¦æƒ…æŽ¥å£å®šæ—¶æŸ¥è¯¢ä»»åŠ¡çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œå»ºè®®æ¯30ç§’æŸ¥è¯¢ä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚\n\n\n\n](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/get-music-generation-details)\n\n---\n\n## Source: https://docs.sunoapi.org/file-upload-api/quickstart\n\n# File Upload API Quickstart - Suno API\n\n## Welcome to File Upload API\n\nThe File Upload API provides flexible and efficient file upload services, supporting multiple upload methods to meet diverse business needs. Whether itâ€™s remote file migration, large file transmission, or quick small file uploads, our API offers the best solutions for your requirements.\n\n## Authentication\n\nAll API requests require authentication using Bearer tokens. Please obtain your API key from the [API Key Management Page](https://sunoapi.org/api-key).\n\n### API Base URL\n\n```\nhttps://sunoapiorg.redpandaai.co\n```\n\n```\nAuthorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY\n```\n\n## Quick Start Guide\n\n### Step 1: Choose Your Upload Method\n\nSelect the appropriate upload method based on your needs:\n\n*   URL File Upload\n    \n*   File Stream Upload\n    \n*   Base64 Upload\n    \n\nSuitable for downloading and uploading files from remote servers:\n\nSuitable for directly uploading local files, especially large files:\n\nSuitable for Base64 encoded file data:\n\n### Step 2: Handle Response\n\nUpon successful upload, youâ€™ll receive a response containing file information:\n\n```\n{\n  \"success\": true,\n  \"code\": 200,\n  \"msg\": \"File uploaded successfully\",\n  \"data\": {\n    \"fileId\": \"file_abc123456\",\n    \"fileName\": \"my-image.jpg\",\n    \"originalName\": \"sample-image.jpg\",\n    \"fileSize\": 245760,\n    \"mimeType\": \"image/jpeg\",\n    \"uploadPath\": \"images\",\n    \"fileUrl\": \"https://sunoapiorg.redpandaai.co/files/images/my-image.jpg\",\n    \"downloadUrl\": \"https://sunoapiorg.redpandaai.co/download/file_abc123456\",\n    \"uploadTime\": \"2025-01-15T10:30:00Z\",\n    \"expiresAt\": \"2025-01-18T10:30:00Z\"\n  }\n}\n```\n\n## Upload Method Comparison\n\nChoose the most suitable upload method for your needs:\n\n## Practical Examples\n\n### Batch File Upload\n\nUsing file stream upload to handle multiple files:\n\n*   JavaScript\n    \n*   Python\n    \n\n```\nclass FileUploadAPI {\n  constructor(apiKey) {\n    this.apiKey = apiKey;\n    this.baseUrl = 'https://sunoapiorg.redpandaai.co';\n  }\n  \n  async uploadFile(file, uploadPath = '', fileName = null) {\n    const formData = new FormData();\n    formData.append('file', file);\n    if (uploadPath) formData.append('uploadPath', uploadPath);\n    if (fileName) formData.append('fileName', fileName);\n    \n    const response = await fetch(`${this.baseUrl}/api/file-stream-upload`, {\n      method: 'POST',\n      headers: {\n        'Authorization': `Bearer ${this.apiKey}`\n      },\n      body: formData\n    });\n    \n    if (!response.ok) {\n      throw new Error(`Upload failed: ${response.statusText}`);\n    }\n    \n    return response.json();\n  }\n  \n  async uploadFromUrl(fileUrl, uploadPath = '', fileName = null) {\n    const response = await fetch(`${this.baseUrl}/api/file-url-upload`, {\n      method: 'POST',\n      headers: {\n        'Authorization': `Bearer ${this.apiKey}`,\n        'Content-Type': 'application/json'\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        fileUrl,\n        uploadPath,\n        fileName\n      })\n    });\n    \n    if (!response.ok) {\n      throw new Error(`Upload failed: ${response.statusText}`);\n    }\n    \n    return response.json();\n  }\n  \n  async uploadBase64(base64Data, uploadPath = '', fileName = null) {\n    const response = await fetch(`${this.baseUrl}/api/file-base64-upload`, {\n      method: 'POST',\n      headers: {\n        'Authorization': `Bearer ${this.apiKey}`,\n        'Content-Type': 'application/json'\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        base64Data,\n        uploadPath,\n        fileName\n      })\n    });\n    \n    if (!response.ok) {\n      throw new Error(`Upload failed: ${response.statusText}`);\n    }\n    \n    return response.json();\n  }\n}\n\n// Usage example\nconst uploader = new FileUploadAPI('YOUR_API_KEY');\n\n// Batch upload files\nasync function uploadMultipleFiles(files) {\n  const results = [];\n  \n  for (let i = 0; i < files.length; i++) {\n    try {\n      const result = await uploader.uploadFile(\n        files[i], \n        'user-uploads', \n        `file-${i + 1}-${files[i].name}`\n      );\n      results.push(result);\n      console.log(`File ${i + 1} uploaded successfully:`, result.data.fileUrl);\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error(`File ${i + 1} upload failed:`, error.message);\n    }\n  }\n  \n  return results;\n}\n\n// Batch upload from URLs\nasync function uploadFromUrls(urls) {\n  const results = [];\n  \n  for (let i = 0; i < urls.length; i++) {\n    try {\n      const result = await uploader.uploadFromUrl(\n        urls[i], \n        'downloads', \n        `download-${i + 1}.jpg`\n      );\n      results.push(result);\n      console.log(`URL ${i + 1} uploaded successfully:`, result.data.fileUrl);\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error(`URL ${i + 1} upload failed:`, error.message);\n    }\n  }\n  \n  return results;\n}\n```\n\n```\nimport requests\nimport base64\nimport os\nfrom typing import List, Optional\n\nclass FileUploadAPI:\n    def __init__(self, api_key: str):\n        self.api_key = api_key\n        self.base_url = 'https://sunoapiorg.redpandaai.co'\n        self.headers = {\n            'Authorization': f'Bearer {api_key}'\n        }\n    \n    def upload_file(self, file_path: str, upload_path: str = '', \n                   file_name: Optional[str] = None) -> dict:\n        \"\"\"File stream upload\"\"\"\n        files = {\n            'file': (os.path.basename(file_path), open(file_path, 'rb'))\n        }\n        \n        data = {}\n        if upload_path:\n            data['uploadPath'] = upload_path\n        if file_name:\n            data['fileName'] = file_name\n        \n        response = requests.post(\n            f'{self.base_url}/api/file-stream-upload',\n            headers=self.headers,\n            files=files,\n            data=data\n        )\n        \n        if not response.ok:\n            raise Exception(f'Upload failed: {response.text}')\n        \n        return response.json()\n    \n    def upload_from_url(self, file_url: str, upload_path: str = '', \n                       file_name: Optional[str] = None) -> dict:\n        \"\"\"URL file upload\"\"\"\n        payload = {\n            'fileUrl': file_url,\n            'uploadPath': upload_path,\n            'fileName': file_name\n        }\n        \n        response = requests.post(\n            f'{self.base_url}/api/file-url-upload',\n            headers={**self.headers, 'Content-Type': 'application/json'},\n            json=payload\n        )\n        \n        if not response.ok:\n            raise Exception(f'Upload failed: {response.text}')\n        \n        return response.json()\n    \n    def upload_base64(self, base64_data: str, upload_path: str = '', \n                     file_name: Optional[str] = None) -> dict:\n        \"\"\"Base64 file upload\"\"\"\n        payload = {\n            'base64Data': base64_data,\n            'uploadPath': upload_path,\n            'fileName': file_name\n        }\n        \n        response = requests.post(\n            f'{self.base_url}/api/file-base64-upload',\n            headers={**self.headers, 'Content-Type': 'application/json'},\n            json=payload\n        )\n        \n        if not response.ok:\n            raise Exception(f'Upload failed: {response.text}')\n        \n        return response.json()\n\n# Usage example\ndef main():\n    uploader = FileUploadAPI('YOUR_API_KEY')\n    \n    # Batch upload local files\n    file_paths = [\n        '/path/to/file1.jpg',\n        '/path/to/file2.png',\n        '/path/to/document.pdf'\n    ]\n    \n    print(\"Starting batch file upload...\")\n    for i, file_path in enumerate(file_paths):\n        try:\n            result = uploader.upload_file(\n                file_path, \n                'user-uploads', \n                f'file-{i + 1}-{os.path.basename(file_path)}'\n            )\n            print(f\"File {i + 1} uploaded successfully: {result['data']['fileUrl']}\")\n        except Exception as e:\n            print(f\"File {i + 1} upload failed: {e}\")\n    \n    # Batch upload from URLs\n    urls = [\n        'https://example.com/image1.jpg',\n        'https://example.com/image2.png'\n    ]\n    \n    print(\"\\nStarting batch URL upload...\")\n    for i, url in enumerate(urls):\n        try:\n            result = uploader.upload_from_url(\n                url, \n                'downloads', \n                f'download-{i + 1}.jpg'\n            )\n            print(f\"URL {i + 1} uploaded successfully: {result['data']['fileUrl']}\")\n        except Exception as e:\n            print(f\"URL {i + 1} upload failed: {e}\")\n\nif __name__ == '__main__':\n    main()\n```\n\n## Error Handling\n\nCommon errors and handling methods:\n\n## Best Practices\n\n## File Storage Information\n\n*   Files are immediately accessible and downloadable after upload\n*   File URLs remain valid for 3 days\n*   The system provides an `expiresAt` field in the response indicating expiration time\n*   Itâ€™s recommended to download or migrate important files before expiration\n*   Use the `downloadUrl` field to get direct download links\n\n## Status Codes\n\n200\n\nSuccess\n\nRequest processed successfully, file upload completed\n\n400\n\nBad Request\n\nRequest parameters are incorrect or missing required parameters\n\n401\n\nUnauthorized\n\nAuthentication credentials are missing or invalid\n\n405\n\nMethod Not Allowed\n\nRequest method is not supported, please check HTTP method\n\n500\n\nServer Error\n\nAn unexpected error occurred while processing the request, please retry or contact support\n\n## Next Steps\n\n## Support\n\n---\n\nReady to start uploading files? [Get your API key](https://sunoapi.org/api-key) and begin using the file upload service immediately!\n\n---\n\n## Source: https://docs.sunoapi.org/file-upload-api/upload-file-url\n\n# URL File Upload - Suno API\n\n```\n{  \"success\": true,  \"code\": 200,  \"msg\": \"File uploaded successfully\",  \"data\": {    \"fileName\": \"uploaded-image.png\",    \"filePath\": \"images/user-uploads/uploaded-image.png\",    \"downloadUrl\": \"https://tempfile.redpandaai.co/xxx/images/user-uploads/uploaded-image.png\",    \"fileSize\": 154832,    \"mimeType\": \"image/png\",    \"uploadedAt\": \"2025-01-01T12:00:00.000Z\"  }}\n```\n\n### Features\n\n*   Supports HTTP and HTTPS file links\n*   Automatically downloads remote files and uploads them\n*   Automatically extracts file names from URLs or uses custom file names\n*   Automatic MIME type recognition\n*   Returns complete file information and download links\n*   API Key authentication protection\n*   Uploaded files are temporary and automatically deleted after 3 days\n\n### Supported Protocols\n\n*   **HTTP**: `http://example.com/file.jpg`\n*   **HTTPS**: `https://example.com/file.jpg`\n\n### Use Cases\n\n*   Migrating files from other services\n*   Batch downloading and storing web resources\n*   Backing up remote files\n*   Caching external resources\n\n### Important Notes\n\n*   Ensure the provided URL is publicly accessible\n*   Download timeout is 30 seconds\n*   Recommended file size limit is 100MB\n\nAll APIs require authentication via Bearer Token.\n\nGet API Key:\n\n1.  Visit [API Key Management Page](https://sunoapi.org/api-key) to get your API Key\n\nUsage: Add to request header: Authorization: Bearer YOUR\\_API\\_KEY\n\nNote:\n\n*   Keep your API Key secure and do not share it with others\n*   If you suspect your API Key has been compromised, reset it immediately in the management page\n\n#### Body\n\napplication/json\n\nfileUrl\n\nstring<uri>\n\nrequired\n\nFile download URL, must be a valid HTTP or HTTPS address\n\nExample:\n\n`\"https://example.com/images/sample.jpg\"`\n\nuploadPath\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nFile upload path, without leading or trailing slashes\n\nExample:\n\n`\"images/downloaded\"`\n\nfileName\n\nstring\n\nFile name (optional), including file extension. If not provided, a random filename will be generated. If the same filename already exists, the old file will be overwritten, but changes may not be immediately visible due to caching\n\nExample:\n\n`\"sample-image.jpg\"`\n\nFile uploaded successfully\n\nsuccess\n\nboolean\n\nrequired\n\nWhether the request was successful\n\ncode\n\nenum<integer>\n\nrequired\n\nResponse status code\n\nAvailable options\n\n:\n\n`200`,\n\n`400`,\n\n`401`,\n\n`405`,\n\n`500`\n\nmsg\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nResponse message\n\nExample:\n\n`\"File uploaded successfully\"`\n\ndata\n\nobject\n\nShow child attributes\n\n---\n\n## Source: https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/add-instrumental\n\n# Add Instrumental - Suno API\n\n[![light logo](https://sunoapi.org/logo.png)![dark ](/suno-api/get-wav-conversion-details)\n\n*   [POST\n    \n    Vocalâ€¯&â€¯Instrument Stem Separation\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/separate-vocals-from-music)\n*   [\n    \n    Audio Separation Callbacks\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/separate-vocals-from-music-callbacks)\n*   [GET\n    \n    Get Audio Separation Details\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/get-vocal-separation-details)\n\n*   [POST\n    \n    Create Music Video\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/create-music-video)\n*   [\n    \n    Music Video Generation Callbacks\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/create-music-video-callbacks)\n*   [GET\n    \n    Get Music Video Details\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/get-music-video-details)\n\n*   [GET\n    \n    Get Remaining Credits\n    \n    \n    \n    ](/suno-api/get-remaining-credits)\n\nAdd Instrumental\n\ncURL\n\n```\ncurl --request POST \\\n  --url https://api.sunoapi.org/api/v1/generate/add-instrumental \\\n  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <token>' \\\n  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n  --data '\n{\n  \"uploadUrl\": \"https://example.com/music.mp3\",\n  \"title\": \"Relaxing Piano\",\n  \"negativeTags\": \"Heavy Metal, Aggressive Drums\",\n  \"tags\": \"Relaxing Piano, Ambient, Peaceful\",\n  \"callBackUrl\": \"https://api.example.com/callback\",\n  \"vocalGender\": \"m\",\n  \"styleWeight\": 0.61,\n  \"weirdnessConstraint\": 0.72,\n  \"audioWeight\": 0.65,\n  \"model\": \"V4_5PLUS\"\n}\n'\n```\n\n200\n\n```\n{\n  \"code\": 200,\n  \"msg\": \"success\",\n  \"data\": {\n    \"taskId\": \"5c79****be8e\"\n  }\n}\n```\n\nPOST\n\n/\n\napi\n\n/\n\nv1\n\n/\n\ngenerate\n\n/\n\nadd-instrumental\n\nTry it\n\nAdd Instrumental\n\ncURL\n\n```\ncurl --request POST \\\n  --url https://api.sunoapi.org/api/v1/generate/add-instrumental \\\n  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <token>' \\\n  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n  --data '\n{\n  \"uploadUrl\": \"https://example.com/music.mp3\",\n  \"title\": \"Relaxing Piano\",\n  \"negativeTags\": \"Heavy Metal, Aggressive Drums\",\n  \"tags\": \"Relaxing Piano, Ambient, Peaceful\",\n  \"callBackUrl\": \"https://api.example.com/callback\",\n  \"vocalGender\": \"m\",\n  \"styleWeight\": 0.61,\n  \"weirdnessConstraint\": 0.72,\n  \"audioWeight\": 0.65,\n  \"model\": \"V4_5PLUS\"\n}\n'\n```\n\n200\n\n```\n{\n  \"code\": 200,\n  \"msg\": \"success\",\n  \"data\": {\n    \"taskId\": \"5c79****be8e\"\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### \n\n[â€‹\n\n](#key-capabilities)\n\n**Key Capabilities**\n\n*   Accepts uploadUrl of an existing audio file (usually vocals or stems).\n*   Supports fine-grained customization via parameters such as:\n    *   tags and negativeTags (musical style controls)\n    *   styleWeight, audioWeight, weirdnessConstraint (stylistic & creative blending)\n    *   vocalGender, title, callBackUrl for metadata & workflow controlÂ  .\n*   Returns a taskId for tracking, and results are retained for 14 days. Callback workflow includes three stages: text, first, and completeÂ  .\n\n### \n\n[â€‹\n\n](#typical-use-cases)\n\n**Typical Use Cases**\n\n*   Singers or melody writers who want instant fuller arrangements around their vocal inputs.\n*   Applications like karaoke platforms, demo-generation tools, or co-creation interfaces that allow users to experiment with accompaniment styles easily.\n\n### \n\n[â€‹\n\n](#parameter-usage-guide)\n\nParameter Usage Guide\n\nRequired parameters for all requests:\n\n*   `uploadUrl`: Valid audio file URL (MP3, WAV, or other supported formats)\n*   `title`: Title for the generated instrumental track (max 100 characters)\n*   `tags`: Desired style and characteristics for the instrumental\n*   `negativeTags`: Styles or instruments to exclude\n*   `callBackUrl`: URL to receive completion notifications\n\nOptional parameters for enhanced control:\n\n*   `vocalGender`: Preferred vocal gender for any vocal elements (â€˜mâ€™ or â€˜fâ€™)\n*   `styleWeight`: Style adherence weight (0.00-1.00)\n*   `weirdnessConstraint`: Creativity/novelty constraint (0.00-1.00)\n*   `audioWeight`: Audio consistency weight (0.00-1.00)\n*   `model`: Model version used for generation. Allowed values: `V4_5PLUS` (default), `V5`\n\nAudio requirements:\n\n*   File Format: MP3, WAV, or other supported audio formats\n*   Quality: Higher quality input generally produces better instrumental results\n*   Accessibility: Ensure uploaded audio URLs are publicly accessible and stable\n\n### \n\n[â€‹\n\n](#developer-notes)\n\nDeveloper Notes\n\n1.  Generated instrumental files are retained for 15 days before being deleted\n2.  Ensure you have proper rights to use the uploaded audio content\n3.  Be specific with tags to get the desired instrumental style (e.g., â€œacoustic guitar, soft piano, ambientâ€)\n4.  Use negative tags effectively to avoid unwanted elements\n5.  Callback process has three stages: text (text generation), first (first track complete), complete (all tracks complete)\n6.  You can use the Get Music Generation Details endpoint to actively check task status instead of waiting for callbacks\n\n#### Authorizations\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#authorization-authorization)\n\nAuthorization\n\nstring\n\nheader\n\nrequired\n\n# ðŸ”‘ API Authentication\n\nAll endpoints require authentication using Bearer Token.\n\n## Get API Key\n\n1.  Visit the [API Key Management Page](https://sunoapi.org/api-key) to obtain your API Key\n\n## Usage\n\nAdd to request headers:\n\n```\nAuthorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY\n```\n\n> âš ï¸ Note:\n> \n> *   Keep your API Key secure and do not share it with others\n> *   If you suspect your API Key has been compromised, reset it immediately from the management page\n\n#### Body\n\napplication/json\n\nThe URL of the uploaded music file to add instrumental to.\n\n*   Required.\n*   Must be a valid audio file URL accessible by the system.\n*   The uploaded audio should be in a supported format (MP3, WAV, etc.).\n\nExample:\n\n`\"https://example.com/music.mp3\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-title)\n\ntitle\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nThe title of the music track.\n\n*   Required.\n*   This will be used as the title for the generated instrumental track.\n\nExample:\n\n`\"Relaxing Piano\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-negative-tags)\n\nnegativeTags\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nMusic styles or traits to exclude from the generated instrumental.\n\n*   Required.\n*   Use to avoid specific styles or instruments in the instrumental version.  \n    Example: \"Heavy Metal, Aggressive Drums\"\n\nExample:\n\n`\"Heavy Metal, Aggressive Drums\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-tags)\n\ntags\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nMusic style and characteristics for the instrumental.\n\n*   Required.\n*   Describe the desired style, mood, and instruments for the instrumental track.  \n    Example: \"Relaxing Piano, Ambient, Peaceful\"\n\nExample:\n\n`\"Relaxing Piano, Ambient, Peaceful\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-call-back-url)\n\ncallBackUrl\n\nstring<uri>\n\nrequired\n\nThe URL to receive task completion notifications when instrumental generation is complete. The callback process has three stages: `text` (text generation), `first` (first track complete), `complete` (all tracks complete). Note: In some cases, `text` and `first` stages may be skipped, directly returning `complete`.\n\nFor detailed callback format and implementation guide, see [Add Instrumental Callbacks](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/add-instrumental-callbacks)\n\n*   Alternatively, you can use the Get Music Generation Details interface to poll task status\n\nExample:\n\n`\"https://api.example.com/callback\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-vocal-gender)\n\nvocalGender\n\nenum<string>\n\nPreferred vocal gender for any vocal elements. Optional. Allowed values: 'm' (male), 'f' (female).\n\nAvailable options:\n\n`m`,\n\n`f`\n\nExample:\n\n`\"m\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-style-weight)\n\nstyleWeight\n\nnumber\n\nStyle adherence weight. Optional. Range: 0-1. Two decimal places recommended.\n\nRequired range: `0 <= x <= 1`Must be a multiple of `0.01`\n\nExample:\n\n`0.61`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-weirdness-constraint)\n\nweirdnessConstraint\n\nnumber\n\nCreativity/novelty constraint. Optional. Range: 0-1. Two decimal places recommended.\n\nRequired range: `0 <= x <= 1`Must be a multiple of `0.01`\n\nExample:\n\n`0.72`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-audio-weight)\n\naudioWeight\n\nnumber\n\nRelative weight of audio consistency versus other controls. Optional. Range: 0-1. Two decimal places recommended.\n\nRequired range: `0 <= x <= 1`Must be a multiple of `0.01`\n\nExample:\n\n`0.65`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#body-model)\n\nmodel\n\nenum<string>\n\ndefault:V4\\_5PLUS\n\nModel version to use for generation. Optional. Default: V4\\_5PLUS.\n\nAvailable options:\n\n`V4_5PLUS`,\n\n`V5`\n\nExample:\n\n`\"V4_5PLUS\"`\n\n#### Response\n\n200\n\napplication/json\n\nRequest successful\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-code)\n\ncode\n\nenum<integer>\n\n# Status Codes\n\n*   âœ… 200 - Request successful\n*   âš ï¸ 400 - Invalid parameters\n*   âš ï¸ 401 - Unauthorized access\n*   âš ï¸ 404 - Invalid request method or path\n*   âš ï¸ 405 - Rate limit exceeded\n*   âš ï¸ 413 - Theme or prompt too long\n*   âš ï¸ 429 - Insufficient credits\n*   âš ï¸ 430 - Your call frequency is too high. Please try again later.\n*   âš ï¸ 455 - System maintenance\n*   âŒ 500 - Server error\n\nAvailable options:\n\n`200`,\n\n`400`,\n\n`401`,\n\n`404`,\n\n`405`,\n\n`413`,\n\n`429`,\n\n`430`,\n\n`455`,\n\n`500`\n\nExample:\n\n`200`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-msg)\n\nmsg\n\nstring\n\nError message when code != 200\n\nExample:\n\n`\"success\"`\n\n[â€‹\n\n](#response-data)\n\ndata\n\nobject\n\nShow child attributes\n\n[Upload and Extend Audio Callbacks](/suno-api/upload-and-extend-audio-callbacks)[Add Instrumental Callbacks](/suno-api/add-instrumental-callbacks)\n\n---\n\n## Source: https://docs.sunoapi.org/\n\n# Suno API Documentation - Suno API\n\n## Welcome to Suno API Documentation\n\nThis documentation provides comprehensive guides and references for integrating [Suno API](https://sunoapi.org/), a platform offering affordable and stable AI music API services that seamlessly integrate into your projects.\n\n## About Suno API\n\nSuno API delivers advanced AI music capabilities through easy-to-integrate APIs, including music generation, lyrics creation, audio processing, and video production. Ideal choice when vocal clarity is paramount.\n\n### V4\\_5 - Smart Prompts\n\nExcellent prompt understanding with faster generation speeds, up to 8 minutes. Our advanced model for complex music requests.\n\n### V4\\_5PLUS - Richer Tones\n\nMost advanced model with enhanced tonal variation and new creative approaches, up to 8 minutes. Best choice for highest quality and longest tracks.\n\n### V4\\_5ALL - Better Song Structure\n\nV4.5-all is better song structure, max 8 min. Perfect for well-structured musical pieces.\n\n### V5 - Latest Model\n\nCutting-edge model with enhanced quality and capabilities. Our newest offering for advanced music generation.\n\n## Use Cases\n\n### ðŸŽ® Game Developers\n\nGenerate dynamic background music, sound effects, and adaptive audio for gaming experiences using our music generation and extension APIs.\n\n### ðŸŽ¬ Content Creators\n\nCreate royalty-free music for videos, podcasts, and social media content with our watermark-free output, enjoying unlimited commercial use rights.\n\n### ðŸ¢ Businesses\n\nIntegrate AI music generation into apps, websites, and services using our high-concurrency API to enhance user experiences.\n\n### ðŸŽ­ Music Producers\n\nPrototype songs, generate ideas, and create full compositions with professional-quality output. Use vocal separation for remixing and audio processing.\n\n### ðŸŽ¤ Karaoke & Entertainment\n\nLeverage timestamped lyrics and vocal separation features for karaoke applications and interactive music experiences.\n\n*   **24/7 Support** - Contact our technical team anytime\n*   **Email Support** - [\\[emailÂ protected\\]](https://docs.sunoapi.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#dcafa9acacb3aea89cafa9b2b3bdacb5f2b3aebb)\n*   **Documentation Updates** - Regular improvements and new features\n*   **API Status** - Monitor real-time service status\n*   **Developer Resources** - Comprehensive guides and best practices\n\n## Callback Integration\n\nAll major endpoints support webhook callbacks for real-time notifications:\n\n*   [Music Generation Callbacks](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/generate-music-callbacks)\n*   [Lyrics Generation Callbacks](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/generate-lyrics-callbacks)\n*   [Music Extension Callbacks](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/extend-music-callbacks)\n*   [Audio Processing Callbacks](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/separate-vocals-from-music-callbacks)\n*   [Music Video Callbacks](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/create-music-video-callbacks)\n*   [WAV Conversion Callbacks](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/convert-to-wav-format-callbacks)\n*   [Cover Callbacks](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/cover-suno-callbacks)\n*   [Upload and Cover Callbacks](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/upload-and-cover-audio-callbacks)\n*   [Upload and Extend Callbacks](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/upload-and-extend-audio-callbacks)\n*   [Add Vocals Callbacks](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/add-vocals-callbacks)\n*   [Add Instrumental Callbacks](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/add-instrumental-callbacks)\n\n## API Base URL\n\nAll API requests should be sent to:\n\n```\nhttps://api.sunoapi.org\n```\n\n## Authentication\n\nAll API requests require authentication using a Bearer token:\n\n```\nAuthorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY\n```\n\nObtain your API key from the [API Key Management Page](https://sunoapi.org/api-key).\n\n---\n\nReady to get started? Choose an API above and follow the quick start guide to begin integrating powerful AI music capabilities into your projects. Visit [Suno API](https://sunoapi.org/) to create your account and start generating amazing music today!\n\n---\n\n## Source: https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/add-instrumental-callbacks\n\n# Add Instrumental Callbacks - Suno API\n\nWhen you submit a task to the Add Instrumental API, you can use the `callBackUrl` parameter to set a callback URL. When the task is completed, the system will automatically push the results to your specified address.\n\n## Callback Mechanism Overview\n\n### Callback Timing\n\nThe system will send callback notifications in the following situations:\n\n*   Instrumental generation task completed successfully\n*   Instrumental generation task failed\n*   Errors occurred during task processing\n\n### Callback Method\n\n*   **HTTP Method**: POST\n*   **Content Type**: application/json\n*   **Timeout Setting**: 15 seconds\n\n## Callback Request Format\n\nWhen the task is completed, the system will send a POST request to your `callBackUrl` in the following format:\n\n## Status Code Description\n\ncode\n\ninteger\n\nrequired\n\nCallback status code indicating task processing result:\n\nStatus Code\n\nDescription\n\n200\n\nSuccess - Instrumental generation completed\n\n400\n\nBad Request - Parameter error, content violation, etc.\n\n451\n\nDownload Failed - Unable to download related files\n\n500\n\nServer Error - Please try again later\n\nmsg\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nStatus message providing detailed status description\n\ndata.callbackType\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nCallback type indicating the current callback stage:\n\n*   `text`: Text generation completed\n*   `first`: First track completed\n*   `complete`: All tracks completed\n*   `error`: Task failed\n\ndata.task\\_id\n\nstring\n\nrequired\n\nTask ID, consistent with the taskId returned when you submitted the task\n\ndata.data\n\narray\n\nInstrumental generation result information, returned on success\n\ndata.data\\[\\].id\n\nstring\n\nAudio unique identifier (audioId)\n\ndata.data\\[\\].audio\\_url\n\nstring\n\nGenerated instrumental audio file URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].source\\_audio\\_url\n\nstring\n\nOriginal instrumental audio file URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].stream\\_audio\\_url\n\nstring\n\nStreaming instrumental audio URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].source\\_stream\\_audio\\_url\n\nstring\n\nOriginal streaming instrumental audio URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].image\\_url\n\nstring\n\nCover image URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].source\\_image\\_url\n\nstring\n\nOriginal cover image URL\n\ndata.data\\[\\].prompt\n\nstring\n\nGeneration prompt describing the instrumental\n\ndata.data\\[\\].model\\_name\n\nstring\n\nModel name used for generation\n\ndata.data\\[\\].title\n\nstring\n\nInstrumental track title\n\ndata.data\\[\\].tags\n\nstring\n\nInstrumental track tags\n\ndata.data\\[\\].createTime\n\nstring\n\nCreation time\n\ndata.data\\[\\].duration\n\nnumber\n\nAudio duration (seconds)\n\n## Callback Reception Examples\n\nHere are example codes for receiving callbacks in popular programming languages:\n\n*   Node.js\n    \n*   Python\n    \n*   PHP\n    \n\n```\nconst express = require('express');\nconst app = express();\n\napp.use(express.json());\n\napp.post('/add-instrumental-callback', (req, res) => {\n  const { code, msg, data } = req.body;\n  \n  console.log('Received instrumental generation callback:', {\n    taskId: data.task_id,\n    callbackType: data.callbackType,\n    status: code,\n    message: msg\n  });\n  \n  if (code === 200) {\n    // Task completed successfully\n    console.log('Instrumental generation completed');\n    const instrumentalData = data.data || [];\n    \n    console.log(`Generated ${instrumentalData.length} instrumental tracks:`);\n    instrumentalData.forEach((instrumental, index) => {\n      console.log(`Instrumental ${index + 1}:`);\n      console.log(`  Title: ${instrumental.title}`);\n      console.log(`  Duration: ${instrumental.duration} seconds`);\n      console.log(`  Tags: ${instrumental.tags}`);\n      console.log(`  Audio URL: ${instrumental.audio_url}`);\n      console.log(`  Cover URL: ${instrumental.image_url}`);\n    });\n    \n    // Process generated instrumental\n    // Can download audio files, save locally, etc.\n    \n  } else {\n    // Task failed\n    console.log('Instrumental generation failed:', msg);\n    \n    // Handle failure cases...\n    if (code === 400) {\n      console.log('Parameter error or content violation');\n    } else if (code === 451) {\n      console.log('File download failed');\n    } else if (code === 500) {\n      console.log('Server internal error');\n    }\n  }\n  \n  // Return 200 status code to confirm callback received\n  res.status(200).json({ status: 'received' });\n});\n\napp.listen(3000, () => {\n  console.log('Callback server running on port 3000');\n});\n```\n\n```\nfrom flask import Flask, request, jsonify\nimport requests\n\napp = Flask(__name__)\n\n@app.route('/add-instrumental-callback', methods=['POST'])\ndef handle_callback():\n    data = request.json\n    \n    code = data.get('code')\n    msg = data.get('msg')\n    callback_data = data.get('data', {})\n    task_id = callback_data.get('task_id')\n    callback_type = callback_data.get('callbackType')\n    instrumental_data = callback_data.get('data', [])\n    \n    print(f\"Received instrumental generation callback: {task_id}, type: {callback_type}, status: {code}, message: {msg}\")\n    \n    if code == 200:\n        # Task completed successfully\n        print(\"Instrumental generation completed\")\n        \n        print(f\"Generated {len(instrumental_data)} instrumental tracks:\")\n        for i, instrumental in enumerate(instrumental_data):\n            print(f\"Instrumental {i + 1}:\")\n            print(f\"  Title: {instrumental.get('title')}\")\n            print(f\"  Duration: {instrumental.get('duration')} seconds\")\n            print(f\"  Tags: {instrumental.get('tags')}\")\n            print(f\"  Audio URL: {instrumental.get('audio_url')}\")\n            print(f\"  Cover URL: {instrumental.get('image_url')}\")\n            \n            # Download audio file example\n            try:\n                audio_url = instrumental.get('audio_url')\n                if audio_url:\n                    response = requests.get(audio_url)\n                    if response.status_code == 200:\n                        filename = f\"generated_instrumental_{task_id}_{i + 1}.mp3\"\n                        with open(filename, \"wb\") as f:\n                            f.write(response.content)\n                        print(f\"Instrumental saved as {filename}\")\n            except Exception as e:\n                print(f\"Audio download failed: {e}\")\n                \n    else:\n        # Task failed\n        print(f\"Instrumental generation failed: {msg}\")\n        \n        # Handle failure cases...\n        if code == 400:\n            print(\"Parameter error or content violation\")\n        elif code == 451:\n            print(\"File download failed\")\n        elif code == 500:\n            print(\"Server internal error\")\n    \n    # Return 200 status code to confirm callback received\n    return jsonify({'status': 'received'}), 200\n\nif __name__ == '__main__':\n    app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=3000)\n```\n\n```\n<?php\nheader('Content-Type: application/json');\n\n// Get POST data\n$input = file_get_contents('php://input');\n$data = json_decode($input, true);\n\n$code = $data['code'] ?? null;\n$msg = $data['msg'] ?? '';\n$callbackData = $data['data'] ?? [];\n$taskId = $callbackData['task_id'] ?? '';\n$callbackType = $callbackData['callbackType'] ?? '';\n$instrumentalData = $callbackData['data'] ?? [];\n\nerror_log(\"Received instrumental generation callback: $taskId, type: $callbackType, status: $code, message: $msg\");\n\nif ($code === 200) {\n    // Task completed successfully\n    error_log(\"Instrumental generation completed\");\n    \n    error_log(\"Generated \" . count($instrumentalData) . \" instrumental tracks:\");\n    foreach ($instrumentalData as $index => $instrumental) {\n        error_log(\"Instrumental \" . ($index + 1) . \":\");\n        error_log(\"  Title: \" . ($instrumental['title'] ?? ''));\n        error_log(\"  Duration: \" . ($instrumental['duration'] ?? 0) . \" seconds\");\n        error_log(\"  Tags: \" . ($instrumental['tags'] ?? ''));\n        error_log(\"  Audio URL: \" . ($instrumental['audio_url'] ?? ''));\n        error_log(\"  Cover URL: \" . ($instrumental['image_url'] ?? ''));\n        \n        // Download audio file example\n        try {\n            $audioUrl = $instrumental['audio_url'] ?? '';\n            if ($audioUrl) {\n                $audioContent = file_get_contents($audioUrl);\n                if ($audioContent !== false) {\n                    $filename = \"generated_instrumental_{$taskId}_\" . ($index + 1) . \".mp3\";\n                    file_put_contents($filename, $audioContent);\n                    error_log(\"Instrumental saved as $filename\");\n                }\n            }\n        } catch (Exception $e) {\n            error_log(\"Audio download failed: \" . $e->getMessage());\n        }\n    }\n    \n} else {\n    // Task failed\n    error_log(\"Instrumental generation failed: $msg\");\n    \n    // Handle failure cases...\n    if ($code === 400) {\n        error_log(\"Parameter error or content violation\");\n    } elseif ($code === 451) {\n        error_log(\"File download failed\");\n    } elseif ($code === 500) {\n        error_log(\"Server internal error\");\n    }\n}\n\n// Return 200 status code to confirm callback received\nhttp_response_code(200);\necho json_encode(['status' => 'received']);\n?>\n```\n\n## Best Practices\n\n## Troubleshooting\n\nIf you do not receive callback notifications, please check the following:\n\n## Alternative Solution\n\nIf you cannot use the callback mechanism, you can also use polling:\n\n[\n\n## Poll Query Results\n\nUse the get music generation details endpoint to regularly query task status. We recommend querying every 30 seconds.\n\n\n\n](https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/get-music-generation-details)\n\n---\n\n## Source: https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/add-vocals\n\n# Add Vocals -
